K is for Knock Out, to be more technical I guess.

mmlore: Hycenea’s fury filled the Tree of Life
completely. Molldyer, The Vedha, Laurey,
and Nalatia, each one the absolute of their
domains, fell back in fear. With a thought,
Hycenea sent them tumbling from their perch
on the Tree into the endless darkness below.
They could stay there forever for all she
cared. The seeds were planted for her
Attendants to grow anew. She was free.
Dryadic Resurrection.name: Dryadic Resurrection

mmlore: In one moment, he felt his love nearby.
In the next, she was gone. The world within
was much like the one he had always known,
the same landscape and the familiar sky,
the only difference was the deafening
silence. Harrakfar traveled the world far
and wide, searching for Hycenea, but soon
realized the truth - he was alone in this
prison reality. From this unyielding loneliness,
madness gave way.
Meshuga.name: Meshuga

mmlore: This peculiar fish seems to
be long dead, but its bones
make a nice rattle noise.
Bone Fish.name: Bone Fish

mmlore: All I've done... all for my people.
Their deaths will be repaid.
C'Zanil's Charm.name: C'Zanil's Charm

mmlore: All I've done... all for my people.
Their deaths will be repaid.
C'Zanil's Charm-1.name: C'Zanil's Charm

yearning to be released.
C'Zanil's Talisman.name: C'Zanil's Talisman

mmlore: A giant tooth, ripped bare from its
scaly owner. Its inner magic
leaks ominously.
Decayed Fang.name: Decayed Fang

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Already chewed in all the right places.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
Dog Bone.name: Dog Bone

mmlore: The fortress of the bone cultists lies before you.
Treasure, and ancient secrets, lie within.
<dark_red>Completion of Here There Be Dragons is required and
<dark_red>end-game gear is heavily recommended for this Strike!
<gray>This Strike features a timer that starts at 30
<gray>seconds and increases with broken spawners.
<gray>Quick thinking and fast play are required.
<aqua>Players: 1-6 (One life per player)
Grants access to the Sealed Remorse Strike.
Dragonbone Key.name: Dragonbone Key

mmlore: Blue mist and ash radiate from the accursed
object, perhaps beckoning power to twist
and deform.
Ethereal Rib.name: Ethereal Rib

mmlore: Sevvet parted the shroud, the pocket
of void they had crafted for their
mission. He gazed down upon his prize,
proof of their success to present to
The Architect. Surely, he thought to
himself, he would soon find himself
home once again, training with the
dragons amongst His presence.
Femur of the Blackflame.name: Femur of the Blackflame

mmlore: In time before the time you know,
the Giants shaped these lands. Shaped
from the mantle, ocean floor, turned
then to ice and sand.
Frost Giant's Staff.name: Frost Giant's Staff

mmlore: Greyskull's followers swore by
his power in every battle.
Greyskull's Spellcaster.name: Greyskull's Spellcaster

mmlore: Risk has always been an inescapable part of warfare.
Remnants of the Captain.name: Remnants of the Captain

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Its owner was never laid to rest.
Restless Bone.name: Restless Bone

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>It bears the mark of those
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>who pledge loyalty to the Queen.
Sigil of Chillwind.name: Sigil of Chillwind

mmlore: Held once by the Shaman who communed
with Myrahg. Their title has been twisted
by time - Soulblighter.
Soulblighter's Scepter.name: Soulblighter's Scepter

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>It pulsates with an odd energy
that makes your own spine crawl.
Spinal Column.name: Spinal Column

mmlore: <!italic><dark_gray><!italic><dark_gray>Best not to consider
<!italic><dark_gray><!italic><dark_gray>how this got mixed.<!italic><dark_purple>
<!italic><dark_gray><!italic><light_purple>* Quest Item *<!italic><dark_purple>
Bloodmeal Ash.name: Bloodmeal Ash

mmlore: Seems frail and ancient.
Boomer Powder.name: Boomer Powder

mmlore: It seems ready to float away.
<bold><yellow>Taking this item outside of the dungeon
<bold><yellow>will instead drop it in the dungeon.
Cloud Meal.name: Cloud Meal

mmlore: <!italic><dark_gray>Serenity now.
Cursed Yeast.name: Cursed Yeast

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
Feyrune Essence.name: Feyrune Essence

mmlore: <gray>Epic Crafting Material
Empires become ruins, ruins become ashes,
and ashes become forgotten.
Forgotten Ashes.name: Forgotten Ashes

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
Leg Cast.name: Leg Cast

mmlore: Those who dared to read the cursed tome known
only as The Book, seeking knowledge, would
soon fall to power outside of their control.
A Revelation On Knowledge Itself.name: A Revelation On Knowledge Itself

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>It contains a few scribbles about the
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>tubes you just sorted.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
Alchemical Report.name: Alchemical Report

mmlore: Countless decades passed since.
In the end, The Book was lost to time.
An Untold Story.name: An Untold Story

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Dark arts scripted in blood and ink.
Ancient Grimoire.name: Ancient Grimoire

mmlore: They had done it. The scientists of
Ishnir and Chillwind had created a living
spirit. A being of conscious nature
infused with the power of Keter magic.
It would be the start of a new Node of
the Tree of Life. Below Malkus would lie
Nihilo. Now, to place this life inside their
construction. A new wool would be made,
for the first time in generations.
Apparatus of Olive.name: Apparatus of Olive

mmlore: An ancient presence fills these pages,
lending power to its wielder.
Ash Codex.name: Ash Codex

mmlore: <gray>Right Button while in the mainhand
<gray>to open the main GUI.
<gray>Shift + Right Button to open a shortcut
<gray>to the shop.
<gray>Shift + Left Button to instantly
<gray>start the next round.
Blitz Master Guide.name: Blitz Master Guide

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>A religious manuscript containing
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>the myth of Alutana.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
Book of Alutana.name: Book of Alutana

mmlore: With the fury of ten thousand wretched
spectres, the realm of stories vanished.
Each page- torn and fluttering in the
ashy air- would burn.
Cat's Destruction.name: Cat's Destruction

mmlore: <dark_gray>So hungry... <obfuscated>Feed <obfuscated>me
Completely Harmless Tome.name: Completely Harmless Tome

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Its pages emit a foul corruption
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>that makes your stomach ache.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
Corrupted Log.name: Corrupted Log

mmlore: A message written in a secretive code.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
Encoded Message.name: Encoded Message

mmlore: Grants access to dungeon:
<#808000>The Fallen Forum
Difficulty : <dark_red>☠☠☠☠☠
Fallen Forum Key.name: Fallen Forum Key

mmlore: "The elements opened before me... this
Doorway at last stands complete. After all
this time. After all I was forced to do,
I can step into the Veil and claim what must
be mine."
Fragment of Reality.name: Fragment of Reality

mmlore: <gray>Press Swap to interact with
<gray>objects in The Gallery of Fear.
<gray>Right Button to view player info.
<bold><yellow>Taking this item outside of the dungeon
<bold><yellow>will instead drop it in the dungeon.
Gallery Brochure.name: Gallery Brochure

mmlore: The tome's spine spasms with explosive energy.
A hungering flame awaited within.
Infernal Codex.name: Infernal Codex

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
#QAFI06
You want to read it so badly...
Josiah's Letter.name: Josiah's Letter

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Details the history of
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>the Frost Moon Knights.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
Knights of the Frost Moon.name: Knights of the Frost Moon

mmlore: Upon witnessing the power of The Book,
some sought to remove not just the
tome itself, but all knowledge of it.
Knowledge's End.name: Knowledge's End

mmlore: The lexicon of forbidden knowledge comes
in many forms. Some are even cute.
<gray><key:key.use/> in main hand or inventory
<gray>to spend 10 levels worth of EXP,
<gray>removing Poison, Wither, and Nausea.
Necronomicon.name: Necronomicon

mmlore: The power of the infernal slowly
demands more and more, with diminishing
returns...
Pact of Punishment.name: Pact of Punishment

mmlore: The legendary folio, composed by ancient hands.
It tells of Giants long ago, who shaped these verdant lands.
Poet's Tome.name: Poet's Tome

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
Poultry Purification Passage.name: Poultry Purification Passage

mmlore: <gray>Epic Crafting Ingredient
Redeemable for fabulous prizes!
Pulsating Ticket Book.name: Pulsating Ticket Book

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Almost all the words have been scratched out.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Perhaps Issa can make some use of it.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
Redacted Mining Records.name: Redacted Mining Records

mmlore: <gray>Epic Crafting Material
All the knowledge in the world
cannot save a man from himself.
Refound Knowledge.name: Refound Knowledge

mmlore: And in his final moments, the Pharaoh would repeat the sins
of his past. The last essence of his life, erasing history
once more. In time, a new vessel would be found.
Purchase of this item will grant you a full set of
cosmetic skills for Cleric and its specializations.
Sins of the Voracious.name: Sins of the Voracious

mmlore: A legendarily bad romance novel.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
Sixteen Shades of Wool.name: Sixteen Shades of Wool

mmlore: <bold><yellow>Taking this item outside of the dungeon
<bold><yellow>will instead drop it in the dungeon.
Somnus Tractate.name: Somnus Tractate

mmlore: "How long has it been now? I have long since
lost track of time. No matter how much I write,
I never seem to run out of space... and, yet,
my earlier notes have gradually become harder
to decipher. I hope it does not continue to deteriorate."
Tattered Notebook.name: Tattered Notebook

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Keeps track of all of the mobs
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>you've killed across the world.
<!italic><gray>Opened with <!italic><gray><key:key.use/></gray></!italic><!italic><gray> while
<!italic><gray>in the mainhand or inventory.
The Bestiary.name: The Bestiary

mmlore: The book that is not a book.
The Glass Canon.name: The Glass Canon

mmlore: Partially erased symbols written on the dusty pages.
Time has not spared the sheets.
Tome of Aquatic Shards.name: Tome of Aquatic Shards

mmlore: Some things were never
meant to be read.
Tome of Arcane Horrors.name: Tome of Arcane Horrors

mmlore: <bold><yellow>Taking this item outside of the dungeon
<bold><yellow>will instead drop it in the dungeon.
Tome of Epiphany.name: Tome of Epiphany

mmlore: Treason, like beauty, is in
the eye of the beholder.
Tome of Insanity.name: Tome of Insanity

mmlore: I don't know about you,
but I'd call that a bargain.
Tome of Judgement.name: Tome of Judgement

mmlore: The chapters just fly by...
Tome of Lost Time.name: Tome of Lost Time

mmlore: "The truth is just an excuse
for lack of imagination."
Tome of Thundering Clouds.name: Tome of Thundering Clouds

mmlore: Do not wait for the Last Judgement.
It takes place every day.
Tome of the Pretsell.name: Tome of the Pretsell

mmlore: Lying is a skill like any other.
And if you want to maintain a
level of excellence, you
have to practice constantly.
Tome of the Rainforest.name: Tome of the Rainforest

mmlore: Yet the power of The Book still lingers,
yearning to be released.
Uncompleted Mystery.name: Uncompleted Mystery

mmlore: After decades of research and a
dive into the darkest of magic,
the seal was broken.
Soon The Book would be too.
Wax Seal.name: Wax Seal

mmlore: The pages are lined with the words of
an ancient god. You feel understanding
flood your mind. The Great Wolf's blessing
has been extended.
Wolfsblood Tome-1.name: Wolfsblood Tome

mmlore: The pages are lined with the words of
an ancient god. You feel understanding
flood your mind. The Great Wolf's blessing
has been extended.
Wolfsblood Tome-2.name: Wolfsblood Tome

mmlore: The pages are lined with the words of
an ancient god. You feel understanding
flood your mind. The Great Wolf's blessing
has been extended.
Wolfsblood Tome-3.name: Wolfsblood Tome

mmlore: The pages are lined with the words of
an ancient god. You feel understanding
flood your mind. The Great Wolf's blessing
has been extended.
Wolfsblood Tome-4.name: Wolfsblood Tome

mmlore: This book details how to properly turn
recently deceased creatures back
into their raw magic essence. There's also
a footnote about turning into plants...
Ybessat's Druidcraft.name: Ybessat's Druidcraft

mmlore: A bow that draws on the mind for
ammunition. Each shot requires
extensive willpower.
Aperion.name: Aperion

mmlore: The storm arrives, a brutal
release of ice.
Arcane Snowstorm.name: Arcane Snowstorm

mmlore: In the furious storm of battle, the
Aurians pierced through. This storm
would drain to the seas...
Arcane Storm.name: Arcane Storm

mmlore: As stars seek day
we'll find our way!
Astri.name: Astri

mmlore: 'Pierce the flesh, and the bones
will follow.' - Hawk Proverb
Bonepiercer.name: Bonepiercer

mmlore: 'Pierce the flesh, and the bones
will follow.' - Hawk Proverb
Bonepiercer-1.name: Bonepiercer

mmlore: 'Pierce the flesh, and the bones
will follow.' - Hawk Proverb
Bonepiercer-2.name: Bonepiercer

mmlore: 'Pierce the flesh, and the bones
will follow.' - Hawk Proverb
Bonepiercer-3.name: Bonepiercer

mmlore: 'Pierce the flesh, and the bones
will follow.' - Hawk Proverb
Bonepiercer-4.name: Bonepiercer

mmlore: From the barrel of the gun,
you hear a symphony of brambles,
claws, and snares.
Bramble Blaster.name: Bramble Blaster

mmlore: When their strength was understood,
they began to grow. Centuries. Aeons.
A forever legion.
Colossal Greatbow.name: Colossal Greatbow

mmlore: Rage and Malevolence.
Corrupted Steelsiege.name: Corrupted Steelsiege

mmlore: A symbol of unification, presented to
you as a gift from both kingdoms.
Crest of Celsia.name: Crest of Celsia

mmlore: Greed is traditionally viewed as a
vice but only a fool allows that to
ruin a good opportunity.
Crest of the Covetous.name: Crest of the Covetous

mmlore: This powerful bow provides infinite
arrows for the most esteemed of
C'Zanil's generals.
Cyrar's Sight.name: Cyrar's Sight

mmlore: Even a captain capable of rallying
uncountable numbers of ruffians
behind him could not escape his
inevitable fate. What hope, then, do you
have to do differently?
Death's Gaze-2.name: Death's Gaze

mmlore: Even a captain capable of rallying
uncountable numbers of ruffians
behind him could not escape his
inevitable fate. What hope, then, do you
have to do differently?
Death's Gaze-3.name: Death's Gaze

mmlore: Even a captain capable of rallying
uncountable numbers of ruffians
behind him could not escape his
inevitable fate. What hope, then, do you
have to do differently?
Death's Gaze-4.name: Death's Gaze

mmlore: Power from memory, manifest.
Demonic Manifest.name: Demonic Manifest

mmlore: All living beings have venom in their souls.
Only the purest adventurer can withstand it.
Divine Soulvenom Bow.name: Divine Soulvenom Bow

mmlore: Its bearer was young, but that
didn't stop him from saving his
friends countless times.
Divine Steelsiege.name: Divine Steelsiege

mmlore: <dark_gray>Its flame is earned from those who came
<dark_gray>before; a ruinous reminder of the cost
<dark_gray>of turning on those who offered power.
Embers of Thori'dal.name: Embers of Thori'dal

mmlore: Shroud your body in the
cover of crackling coals.
Embers of the Hearth.name: Embers of the Hearth

mmlore: <dark_gray>Callicarpa felt freedom for the first time in
<dark_gray>eons the moment Indigo was damaged. In
<dark_gray>that freedom, she learned what had happened
<dark_gray>to her siblings and wept.
Floral Anguish-3.name: Floral Anguish

mmlore: <dark_gray>Callicarpa felt freedom for the first time in
<dark_gray>eons the moment Indigo was damaged. In
<dark_gray>that freedom, she learned what had happened
<dark_gray>to her siblings and wept.
Floral Anguish-4.name: Floral Anguish

mmlore: An arcane contradiction.
Freezeflame.name: Freezeflame

mmlore: Can we please stop naming bows to be
storm related? We can only texture
storm bows in so many ways!
Fury of the Designer.name: Fury of the Designer

mmlore: When the storm clears,
all is washed away.
Fury of the Storm.name: Fury of the Storm

mmlore: Droplets of water are drawn into
the chamber and rapidly frozen,
creating deadly ice bolts.
Glacial Railgun.name: Glacial Railgun

mmlore: When supply chains ran thin, the
Eastern wardens sought other methods
than fletching.
Highstorm.name: Highstorm

mmlore: A Wonder to all, Hippolyta's
revenge knows no bounds.
Hippolyta's Revenge.name: Hippolyta's Revenge

mmlore: The untold power of a tide frozen in
time ripples through this bow.
Icicle Greatbow.name: Icicle Greatbow

mmlore: Mobs die if they are killed, this
bow did nothing wrong.
Imminent Requiem.name: Imminent Requiem

mmlore: When it finally comprehended its isolation,
it began to multiply. One mind. One soul.
One million strong.
Legionis.name: Legionis

mmlore: The automatons within the Machine carry
a variety of tools, each purpose-built
for their role in the grand factory.
Their efficiency, however, does not make them
poor weapons in a pinch.
Mechanized Pipepuncher-2.name: Mechanized Pipepuncher

mmlore: The automatons within the Machine carry
a variety of tools, each purpose-built
for their role in the grand factory.
Their efficiency, however, does not make them
poor weapons in a pinch.

for their role in the grand factory.
Their efficiency, however, does not make them
poor weapons in a pinch.
Mechanized Pipepuncher-4.name: Mechanized Pipepuncher

mmlore: <dark_gray>A brutal bow, made from twisting roots
<dark_gray>and the heartstrings of those who fell
<dark_gray>ill of the Mycelia.
Mycelian Crescent-0.name: Mycelian Crescent

mmlore: <dark_gray>A brutal bow, made from twisting roots
<dark_gray>and the heartstrings of those who fell
<dark_gray>ill of the Mycelia.

<dark_gray>would outlast him if he didn't finish his hunt soon.

mmlore: <dark_gray>The ascendant Emperor, Pelias Silvari, stood
<dark_gray>triumphant in the newly excavated citadel
<dark_gray>deep below the earth. Central to the cavern,
<dark_gray>withered and ancient, was a tree, from which a
<dark_gray>silvery aura grew. Reverently he approached
<dark_gray>it, hand outstretched, ready to take on the
<dark_gray>mantle he believed Uriddan once commanded.
<dark_gray>Instead, as soon as his palm touched the bark,
there was a cacophonous noise as the energy
of thousands of Antium citizens cried out
<dark_gray>as one. The barrier rejected Pelias' lineage.
<dark_gray>The barrier rejected Pelias' empire. Instead,
<dark_gray>they all vanished, becoming one with the Machine.
Cog of The Machine.name: Cog of The Machine

mmlore: The spores are changing their form
every time you look at them.

Terrible. Sickening.
The sun froze in the sky.
The Sanctum itself crumbled.
Kaul's anger rumbled forth.

The doors of the Arboretum shut.
By The Father's grace, they would survive.

Knowledge for another eternity?

The wool he kept hidden from us
for all those moons. My connection
was severed mercilessly.

I will not abide it. Your council is no longer required."

Primordial Blaze-2.name: Primordial Blaze

lasted eons, a searing brand

mmlore: A blessing of the divine.
A gift from a father.
A tool for a Paladin.
Seraphic Hauberk.name: Seraphic Hauberk

mmlore: Outside the bounds of this known realm,
know that eternally you fall under my watchful eye.
Shattered Sovereign.name: Shattered Sovereign

mmlore: The magic swirling through the Congress overwhelmed
Tedac's body and he ascended into a new form.
The voice was pleased, then took control.
Shroud of the Lost.name: Shroud of the Lost

mmlore: <dark_gray>"You have met the Shadow. You have seen
<dark_gray>death, then? He stands outside even my
<dark_gray>control now..."
Silver Emperor's Shadow-3.name: Silver Emperor's Shadow

water, its beauty testament to the
Architect's grand design.

who seek from within will find guidance.

the rootmind. Then, the Dichen threat
would be dealt with the same way it
had so long ago. Infection.
Sporebound Husk-2.name: Sporebound Husk

of the Keep still repelled all invaders.
The empire would not fall. Not from
the outside...

mmlore: There is a saying about those in
power: They must watch every step,
lest they become a slave in a prison
of their own making.
Starboard Mail.name: Starboard Mail

mmlore: The cities stood untarnished, torrents
of water still flowing through the ancient
aqueducts. The creation of fallen gods,
untouched by time.
The Cascade's Ignorance-0.name: The Cascade's Ignorance

mmlore: The black thread of their garb blended
well with the darkness of the Dichen wood.
In and out, without a sound. The plan
could not tolerate error.
Thief's Raiment-2.name: Thief's Raiment

well with the darkness of the Dichen wood.
In and out, without a sound. The plan

mmlore: A chill grips your heart and lungs.
Frost lingers on your breath.
Despite the discomfort, you feel refreshed.
True Ice Shroud.name: True Ice Shroud

mmlore: The eyes seem to sink further into the depths
around you. Distance is held.
Veil's Horizon.name: Veil's Horizon

mmlore: As moons passed, the stars began to shift in the
absence of magic. As Merdd stood watch, it began
to feel a strange presence... watching... It strengthened
its defenses, and hoped this feeling would pass.
Watcher's Warning-2.name: Watcher's Warning

mmlore: As moons passed, the stars began to shift in the
absence of magic. As Merdd stood watch, it began
to feel a strange presence... watching... It strengthened
its defenses, and hoped this feeling would pass.
Watcher's Warning-3.name: Watcher's Warning

mmlore: Sometimes whispers deafen
more than screams.
Whispering Chains.name: Whispering Chains

mmlore: No chains will bind The Prophet's
wings. No shadows will block her light.
Alutana was surely sent to speak for
the Stars above.
Wings of Alutana.name: Wings of Alutana

mmlore: At the edge of reality bubbles a substance
known as Void. Perhaps it will offer me
more than the Veil ever had.
Consumption.name: Consumption

mmlore: "I reject my humanity, Fangride!"
Crondis' Stone Mask.name: Crondis' Stone Mask

mmlore: A crown woven from chains. Adorned
with Lilacs and Roses, it was rusted
in the Spring rains.
Crown of Chains.name: Crown of Chains

mmlore: Blazing flames dance in the
shape of a crown.
Crown of Flames.name: Crown of Flames

mmlore: Visions of the future leak from
every shimmering chain link.
Crown of Unseen Knowledge.name: Crown of Unseen Knowledge

mmlore: "Flow with the ocean,
slice with the depths,
breathe in their blood."
Crown of the Depths.name: Crown of the Depths

mmlore: Each tarnished chain shimmers with
the possibility of returning with what
lies beyond the Veil.
Crown of the Lost Beyond-3.name: Crown of the Lost Beyond

mmlore: Each tarnished chain shimmers with
the possibility of returning with what
lies beyond the Veil.
Crown of the Lost Beyond-4.name: Crown of the Lost Beyond

mmlore: The Knights shrugged off even the
mightiest of blows. Many compared
their unshakable tenacity to the
will of ancient dragons who once allied with Silver.
Dragonscale Helm-1.name: Dragonscale Helm

mightiest of blows. Many compared
their unshakable tenacity to the
will of ancient dragons who once allied with Silver.

mmlore: It started with a rumble. The kind that
shakes not just the earth, but your soul.
Kaul woke.
Eyes of C'Axtal.name: Eyes of C'Axtal

mmlore: Decades of rituals have twisted
Ghalkor's very bones into something
nearly inhuman.
Ghalkor's Gaze.name: Ghalkor's Gaze

mmlore: A crown for the Crimson King.
Hellborn Crown.name: Hellborn Crown

mmlore: M'lord.
Hellborn Fedora.name: Hellborn Fedora

mmlore: Some mages become hunters themselves.
The trophies are a twisted reminder
of Chillwind's current hierarchy.
Mage Hunter's Mask.name: Mage Hunter's Mask

mmlore: In a realm known only by legends, does
not every myth become reality?
Mask of Myths.name: Mask of Myths

mmlore: A lush crown embodying the fury
of the shifting complex.
Rageroot Crown.name: Rageroot Crown

mmlore: Reflected in its gem you see a massive
tree, reaching toward the heavens.
Rootweave Diadem.name: Rootweave Diadem

mmlore: The Ashkii would often send scouts
out into the decaying castle. Few
would ever return.
Scout's Halfhelm-1.name: Scout's Halfhelm

mmlore: The Ashkii would often send scouts
out into the decaying castle. Few
would ever return.

atop their walls, but truly they
are rotting from within.
Sentinel's Cap-1.name: Sentinel's Cap

<dark_gray>the Silver Order adorning it.
Silver Order Shako-2.name: Silver Order Shako

mmlore: C'Telsket's proudest followers
fell to the vile memories echoed
in Ephemerality.
Soulseeker's Visage.name: Soulseeker's Visage

mmlore: <dark_gray>Another night fell on the bubbling poison swamps
<dark_gray>of Galos, and Tarri wanted nothing more but
<dark_gray>to rest. She knew she could not leave until she
<dark_gray>found the creature's crystal coccoon, however.
<dark_gray>If she so much as closed her eyes, the death
<dark_gray>wind would be upon her. But she would not be
<dark_gray>alone for long...
Tarri's Windeater-2.name: Tarri's Windeater

mmlore: <dark_gray>Another night fell on the bubbling poison swamps
<dark_gray>of Galos, and Tarri wanted nothing more but
<dark_gray>to rest. She knew she could not leave until she
<dark_gray>found the creature's crystal coccoon, however.
<dark_gray>If she so much as closed her eyes, the death

mmlore: Light fades into a moonless night.
In their eyes, constellations dance.
Umbras Visage.name: Umbras Visage

mmlore: <dark_gray>Tarri's mission was at last complete. The
<dark_gray>cloudy creature was locked within the Wool,
<dark_gray>as best she could manage. But when she
<dark_gray>reached out for an escort across the
<dark_gray>ocean, the Silver Emperor instead gave
<dark_gray>cryptic instructions: Remain in place.
Across the Ocean-2.name: Across the Ocean

mmlore: <dark_gray>Tarri's mission was at last complete. The

mmlore: Under the scarlet glow of this new world,
a single spark of life emerged.
Bloodmoon Chains.name: Bloodmoon Chains

mmlore: Without a Prophet, how will His
Light radiate beyond the snow? A
vessel must be built for the Lord's
word to break free.
Brightbind.name: Brightbind

mmlore: A pirate worth his salt knows that metal
garments have no place on a ship. The sea
water will weather them to rust and the
waves will drag them below.
Cannonball Chains.name: Cannonball Chains

mmlore: <dark_gray>The first Lunacrest searched for power
<dark_gray>at the site of Uriddan's throne. Instead,
<dark_gray>they called the gaze of the final Herald.
<dark_gray>The sky still quivers with fear.
Celestial Siege-1.name: Celestial Siege

mmlore: <dark_gray>The first Lunacrest searched for power
<dark_gray>at the site of Uriddan's throne. Instead,
<dark_gray>they called the gaze of the final Herald.
<dark_gray>The sky still quivers with fear.
Celestial Siege-2.name: Celestial Siege

mmlore: Adapting to the crushing depths,
each step alters their form, concealing
you from watchful eyes. Are these
chains... alive?
Cephalopodic Chains.name: Cephalopodic Chains

mmlore: When one of the chains holding the island
broke, there was no better use for the
magic than to be worn.
Chains from Below the Waves.name: Chains from Below the Waves

mmlore: Frost may coat the lakes and streams,
but the greens of Spring lie beyond
the long and lonely Winter.
Chains of Ice and Ivy.name: Chains of Ice and Ivy

mmlore: Death begets only death. The Silver
legacy of the Silvari prophesied their
doom long before Pelias and his folly.
Yet the life of their empire was a wonder to behold.
Chains of Inertia-1.name: Chains of Inertia

mmlore: Death begets only death. The Silver
legacy of the Silvari prophesied their
doom long before Pelias and his folly.
Yet the life of their empire was a wonder to behold.
Chains of Inertia-2.name: Chains of Inertia

mmlore: Death begets only death. The Silver
legacy of the Silvari prophesied their
doom long before Pelias and his folly.

Yet the life of their empire was a wonder to behold.
Chains of Inertia-4.name: Chains of Inertia

mmlore: An empire once stood in this sunken place.
Now all that remains is Memory.
Chains of the Deep.name: Chains of the Deep

mmlore: Ancient scales, scavenged by
the Blackflame cultists. What
terrible Beasts once wore
them proudly?
Dragonscale Greaves.name: Dragonscale Greaves

mmlore: A ghostly howl rings through the air -
a chime that signals all to be wary.
Ethereal Greaves.name: Ethereal Greaves

mmlore: A voice filled my very being.
It told me I had betrayed.
It told me I must pay.
That the safety of the Valley
was at risk. All because of me.
Folly of C'Axtal.name: Folly of C'Axtal

mmlore: The fury of one million flows through your veins.
A legion walks the halls beside you.
Fractured Threads.name: Fractured Threads

mmlore: Alric returned, his act was done.
Then, alone, his Knights did kneel.
Frostmoon Chains.name: Frostmoon Chains

mmlore: Once owned by a professor of wind magic,
the greaves were lost in a levitation mishap,
then found in a separate one.
Galemage's Greaves.name: Galemage's Greaves

mmlore: Crafted from a strange metal, mostly
unseen in the Valley.
Ironscale Leggings.name: Ironscale Leggings

mmlore: Crafted from a strange metal, mostly
unseen in the Valley.
Ironscale Leggings-2.name: Ironscale Leggings

mmlore: Crafted from a strange metal, mostly
unseen in the Valley.
Ironscale Leggings-3.name: Ironscale Leggings

mmlore: Crafted from a strange metal, mostly
unseen in the Valley.
Ironscale Leggings-4.name: Ironscale Leggings

mmlore: Nothing lost, nothing gained.
Jorts of Monshee.name: Jorts of Monshee

mmlore: Hard labor should be rewarded;
here, the reward was a swift death.
Laborious Chains.name: Laborious Chains

mmlore: A faint scream can be heard after the
introduction of environmental damage
armor piercing. The words barely make
out to be "DEVELOPERS!!"
Leggings of Insanity.name: Leggings of Insanity

mmlore: The best of armor is tempered
not by the forge, but by the harsh
extremes of nature.
Leviathan Scales.name: Leviathan Scales

mmlore: Often light is referred to as a last hope, save
for when it is twisted through countless refractions
again and again, becoming something truly malicious.
Memory of the Star-2.name: Memory of the Star

mmlore: Often light is referred to as a last hope, save
for when it is twisted through countless refractions
again and again, becoming something truly malicious.
Memory of the Star-3.name: Memory of the Star

mmlore: Often light is referred to as a last hope, save
for when it is twisted through countless refractions
again and again, becoming something truly malicious.
Memory of the Star-4.name: Memory of the Star

mmlore: Even as the city crumbles into
nothingness, those brave enough
to stand against the unknown
will protect those who need it.
Might of New Antium-1.name: Might of New Antium

mmlore: Even as the city crumbles into
nothingness, those brave enough
to stand against the unknown
will protect those who need it.
Might of New Antium-2.name: Might of New Antium

will protect those who need it.

mmlore: Above all else, the desire to
persist reigns supreme.
Persistent Chains.name: Persistent Chains

mmlore: Imbued with powers of old, from the bubbling
birth of earth, sea, and sky.
Primordial Skin.name: Primordial Skin

mmlore: The chains seem to twist endlessly,
each link a part of an infinite
thread unravelling.
Protean Chains.name: Protean Chains

mmlore: The mighty fist grasping the Wolfswood would serve
as fuel for its people's passion. When a flower
survives being crushed, it grows back ever stronger.
Roots of the Fen-2.name: Roots of the Fen

mmlore: The mighty fist grasping the Wolfswood would serve
as fuel for its people's passion. When a flower
survives being crushed, it grows back ever stronger.
Roots of the Fen-3.name: Roots of the Fen

Roots of the Fen-4.name: Roots of the Fen

mmlore: Blood pulses through the chains, each
beat desperately seeking to match
that of your own heart.
Sanguine Greaves.name: Sanguine Greaves

mmlore: Broken and separated from reality.
A floating presence.
Treading along a shattered path.
Spectral Loincloth.name: Spectral Loincloth

mmlore: Even more enticing, the scale
can be enhanced.
Steelscale Leggings.name: Steelscale Leggings

mmlore: A deep roar consumed the valley, the
intruders will soon feel the wrath
and fury of The Jungle.
Thunderous Greaves.name: Thunderous Greaves

mmlore: Deicide was not an act taken
lightly by the Abello, but as their
bound brethren suffered, they
saw no other choice.
Toxin-Cursed Bind-2.name: Toxin-Cursed Bind

mmlore: Deicide was not an act taken
lightly by the Abello, but as their
bound brethren suffered, they
saw no other choice.
Toxin-Cursed Bind-3.name: Toxin-Cursed Bind

lightly by the Abello, but as their
bound brethren suffered, they
saw no other choice.
Toxin-Cursed Bind-4.name: Toxin-Cursed Bind

mmlore: After falling to silver blades, her
rebirth was interrupted. The dryad
was given a new mission, from a far
more insidious god.
Venomous Folly-1.name: Venomous Folly

mmlore: After falling to silver blades, her
rebirth was interrupted. The dryad
was given a new mission, from a far
more insidious god.
Venomous Folly-2.name: Venomous Folly

rebirth was interrupted. The dryad
was given a new mission, from a far

Venomous Folly-3.name: Venomous Folly

rebirth was interrupted. The dryad

Venomous Folly-4.name: Venomous Folly

mmlore: Knowledge flowed in the Viridian Empire
like water. When the collapse came, the
water would carry it all away.
Viridis Construct.name: Viridis Construct

mmlore: Something even more wicked brews within
this dark heart. This evil, you could use
for something else...
Heart of Dread.name: Heart of Dread

mmlore: Little sparks of flame dance
on the surface.
Unstable Sparkler.name: Unstable Sparkler

probably fit something inside it.
<gray><key:key.use> while holding to open.

mmlore: The stone shimmers with energy, seemingly
reverted to a previous form of itself.
Rewound Stone.name: Rewound Stone

mmlore: "I don't know how I did it, but I
managed to incapacitate one of the
guardians roaming this forest. It took
more magic than I knew I had in me, but
at last, the Immortal froze and screamed.
I don't know why, but I took the helm
it wore before I fled."
Helm of Immortals.name: Helm of Immortals

mmlore: "Strange fruit, flitting in and out of
existence, keep appearing on the willows
around me. In their wake, are monstrosities."
Otherworldly Fruit.name: Otherworldly Fruit

mmlore: From the Tree came the Crown. Tasting
the flesh is a blessing few have
ever experienced.
Fruit of Life.name: Fruit of Life

mmlore: Deep below the Tree of Life, an emptiness
had begun to gnaw. From nothing they came.
Into nothing they must go.
Nihilo Pome.name: Nihilo Pome

mmlore: From the Tree also came the Rats.
Their flesh is tough and chewy, yet,
the blessing still holds.
Rat of Life.name: Rat of Life

mmlore: The portal inside allows you to
reach all of the trinkets you've
encountered in your journeys.
<key:key.use> in your hand or
inventory to access your trinkets.

mmlore: <dark_gray>Before, there were armies of Knights. Now,
<dark_gray>their numbers are collapsing. This is all
<dark_gray>thanks to what Uriddan needs. Only his mission
<dark_gray>mattered. As slumbering Knights across the
<dark_gray>world were slaughtered, their essence
<dark_gray>returned to him, leaving a trail of corpses
<dark_gray>and confused and injured people behind.
<dark_gray>All in the service of the great Architect.
Uriddan's Eternal Call (A15).name: Uriddan's Eternal Call (A15)

protected by dragons lost to time.

in the summer heat. It has a small beetle
engraved on the face.

The coin calls to you,
promising endless fortune.
But you know what truly lies beneath:
endless bondage to the deep.

the way realities bleed into this place.
I've been assaulted by strange humanoid fae,
whispering tales of my death. It's very
odd. They seemed shocked when I didn't die."

<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>The mist awaits... I meet ye there.

<dark_red>Completion of The Scourge of Lunacy and the
<dark_red>Palace of Mirrors are recommended for this boss!
<gray>The Horseman's relentless speed and powerful
<gray>attacks are sure to catch the slow or unprepared.
<aqua>Players: 1-6 (One life per player)
Grants access to The Headless Horseman.
Unlucky Horseshoe.name: Unlucky Horseshoe

mmlore: The chime swirls with flowing water,
playing a soft melody.
Water's Embrace.name: Water's Embrace

mmlore: It seems there's a reason there
is no Spider tribe.
Arachnobane.name: Arachnobane

mmlore: This axe holds the power of a
million winds, accumulated by
generations of bearers.
Autumn Wind.name: Autumn Wind

mmlore: You cannot hide within the trees.
Nothing made from nature is free
from his wrath.
Clearcut.name: Clearcut

mmlore: Every mighty impact grows its strength.
Each monstrous swing carves a path
for more to follow.
Colossal Crusher.name: Colossal Crusher

mmlore: Even in death, our stand will see this
rampart to the end of its days.

through the capital, seeking new life.
No weapon could slay them quickly enough.
Their life, however, could find new purpose.
Death's Siphon.name: Death's Siphon

mmlore: It consumed the energy of the world
around it, slowly increasing its power.
Increasing its awareness.
Devouring Wind.name: Devouring Wind

mmlore: Alone, unstoked. Still the fires
burned... waiting...
Forlorn Flames.name: Forlorn Flames

mmlore: <dark_gray>Memories cling to the edges of the time
<dark_gray>they once occupied. Some slip through
<dark_gray>the cracks and never let go.
Memoria Ancestrale-2.name: Memoria Ancestrale

mmlore: Once you meet its gaze, it will
not rest until your defeat.
Phoenix's Gaze.name: Phoenix's Gaze

mmlore: This axe once belonged to Commander Haynes, who
lost her life in the Sanctum during the war.
With the Sons' presence encroaching, the Highwatch
scouts have taken this tool to enact what she would have
wanted - the Sons beheaded and the Fortress dismantled.
Sketched Clearcut.name: Sketched Clearcut

mmlore: All memory loses itself to parting ages.
Slowly, their grip on the mind fades,
and they become lost forever.
Tenebra.name: Tenebra

mmlore: Previously, it was the role of nature to decide the fate
of those who had wronged it. That power now belonged
to Hycenea. An ancient power, held with a new cruelty.
Agaric Abhorrence-4.name: Agaric Abhorrence

mmlore: He spilled the blood.
For his sacrifice, his dreams were actualized.
So too were his nightmares.
Aspiration.name: Aspiration

mmlore: Ripped from the corpse of
a Blackflame Cultist, their
lifeblood still stains the
bone it is shaped from.
Blackflame Solleret.name: Blackflame Solleret

mmlore: <dark_gray>Something lived in the city by the emptiness
<dark_gray>once. Whatever it once was had to be eliminated
<dark_gray>once Uriddan commanded it...
Footprints Beneath Void-2.name: Footprints Beneath Void

mmlore: <dark_gray>Something lived in the city by the emptiness
<dark_gray>once. Whatever it once was had to be eliminated

mmlore: Ransacking and defiling our temples... Is
nothing sacred to these sea rats?

mmlore: History travels the road with those
who still remember it.

mmlore: Johannes' feet stomped upon the deck of his longship.
Behind him was nothing but memories and dust.
Before him, Kaulslund.
A new home for his people.
King's Sabatons.name: King's Sabatons

mmlore: You feel a prick, and see your blood
running through the veins of the machinery.
What madman built these?
Mechanized Treads.name: Mechanized Treads

mmlore: Isadora's heels clicked on the cold tiles of
the castle floor. Before her, the
strongest mages in the empire: the Mage's Council.
Queen's Sabatons.name: Queen's Sabatons

mmlore: The blood-soaked bracelets retain their
shape even inside the nightmare, leaving
a trail of blood behind them.
Royal Anklets-2.name: Royal Anklets

shape even inside the nightmare, leaving

Royal Anklets-4.name: Royal Anklets

than face his folly. The great empire
of Viridia sunk beneath the waves,
drowned forevermore.
Salazar's Spats.name: Salazar's Spats

mmlore: In one's journey to seek out the stars, one
must also know the cost of their path.
Soothing Starblood-1.name: Soothing Starblood

must also know the cost of their path.

can see a reflection of a glorious
shimmering sky.

Colossal Chestplate.name: Colossal Chestplate

mmlore: The real Elysium was right
here, all along.

mmlore: Some were forged in the flames.
Those with power were born in it.
Those beyond were there when the flames were lit.

mmlore: Become unstoppable.
Giant Armor.name: Giant Armor

mmlore: When all is troubled and twisted, muddled
and lost, there is respite and peace
with the Heart of the Sea.

mmlore: When the wind, the fire, and all is gone,
caress me with your sweet lullaby...

mmlore: Heavy and restricting, this
bronzed cuirass can absorb
all manner of punishing blow.
Indomitable.name: Indomitable

mmlore: The warmth's embrace felt the suffering around it.
The will of the flame stifled slightly in its slumber.
Soon, all would be turned to ash.
Infernal Breastplate.name: Infernal Breastplate

mmlore: Skirt along the fire's rim, and you shall
know its heat. Familiarize yourself and
draw ever closer to it.
Iza's Scales.name: Iza's Scales

mmlore: The Jungle felt the approach of outsiders.
He stirred slightly in his slumber.
War was coming...
Kaul's Warden.name: Kaul's Warden

mmlore: Johannes' heart was filled with
fear, but he knew what must be done.
He banished the fear, and began
to ring the bells.
King's Warden.name: King's Warden

mmlore: The exodus from the capital was long.
Even the strongest soldiers could not
withstand the freezing desert nights.

bet with the Casino owner.
Myriad's Embrace.name: Myriad's Embrace

mmlore: Her heart raced as she approached the jungle's edge.
Isadora's troops rallied behind her,
ready to lay down their lives for their home.
Queen's Warden.name: Queen's Warden

mmlore: Laced with light-filtering gems, it is often
<dark_gray>worn to bolster hope under a shattering sky.

foundation of the Sanctum. Ru'Ten didn't have a
reason to leave the chamber, why would he?

from all manner of noxious attack.

Kingdom, fear in his eyes. He saw what
was coming. What had broken...
King's Crown.name: King's Crown

mmlore: A glorious crown that
wards dark magics.
Opal Crown.name: Opal Crown

mmlore: Isadora looked up at the sky above;
the rain hid the tears rolling down her face.
She would never forgive the one who killed him.
Queen's Crown.name: Queen's Crown

by one massive spike. Its fate seems
fixed in history.

mmlore: The artifact in C'Zanil's hand flashed twice.
The wounded Tlaxani around him
screamed then fell silent - their
souls fuel for the war.

mmlore: With a thunderous crash of salt
and sea, the archives of Viridis
were lost to the waves. The seafoam
is stained with ink.

mmlore: <dark_gray>Uriddan knew these citadels well. They had
<dark_gray>sprung forth at the command of Indigo itself,
<dark_gray>before even he could remember.

mmlore: Fast he hid from battle fierce,
An eye that deeply bled;
The Mountain Carver must escape
the bounty on his head.

attempt to escape its own. Horrors of unimaginable
fortitude were forever confined within, but if more
were to somehow break free...

has a 100% mortality rate.

the might of a blade. No, Hekawt longed for
so much more. He sought Eternity.

the magic within the Forum strengthens
it to be a mass killing tool.

Evoking its name conjures visions
of impossible madness.

mmlore: To say nothing can cost the most of all.

mmlore: Death stalked the halls of
the Plagueroot temple.
Reaper's Harvest-3.name: Reaper's Harvest

mmlore: Death stalked the halls of
the Plagueroot temple.
Reaper's Harvest-4.name: Reaper's Harvest

mmlore: The truth of Al Malakut has at last been
told. Now you hold its power.
Soul of Ishnir.name: Soul of Ishnir

mmlore: Necrosis is but the beginning, a soul must
be severed to attain new life.
Soulreaper.name: Soulreaper

mmlore: Even the most ferocious of seafarers lost
limbs in their most storied battles. A spare few
gained notoriety, seen wearing unorthodox
prostheses into battle.
Spider's Crux.name: Spider's Crux

mmlore: Washed free from the blackened ash that
clung to the old blade, the sickle
now swings faster than the wind.
Thresher's Harvester.name: Thresher's Harvester

mmlore: While scholars are known for their peaceful
research, the tomes they study don't
tend to be as polite.
Archivist's Legguards.name: Archivist's Legguards

mmlore: Aether - liquid mana. The purest form
of the Machine's spirit. Now hardened
into a protective shell.
Core-Injected Safety Suit-2.name: Core-Injected Safety Suit

mmlore: Aether - liquid mana. The purest form
of the Machine's spirit. Now hardened
into a protective shell.
Core-Injected Safety Suit-3.name: Core-Injected Safety Suit

mmlore: Aether - liquid mana. The purest form
of the Machine's spirit. Now hardened
into a protective shell.
Core-Injected Safety Suit-4.name: Core-Injected Safety Suit

mmlore: Become unstoppable.
Giant Leggings.name: Giant Leggings

mmlore: <dark_gray>The soul deep within Chenmai provided fierce
<dark_gray>protection to those who called it home. Those
<dark_gray>further afield could still seek protection
<dark_gray>by taking a piece with them.
Godtree Greaves-1.name: Godtree Greaves

mmlore: The eruption within the tomes could be held
no longer. Burst forth from their prisons,
this world will see their brightest flame.
Infernal Greaves.name: Infernal Greaves

mmlore: As the bells rang out, darkness began
to gather in wisps overhead. Johannes'
legs grew weak, but he steeled himself,
and ran.
King's Greaves.name: King's Greaves

mmlore: They say he never stopped putting
roses on things...
Madman's Leggings.name: Madman's Leggings

mmlore: The warriors of the Lyrata melted in their
suits of gleaming bronze, entombed in monuments
to their own folly.
Melded Bronzeskin-1.name: Melded Bronzeskin

mmlore: The warriors of the Lyrata melted in their
suits of gleaming bronze, entombed in monuments
to their own folly.
Melded Bronzeskin-2.name: Melded Bronzeskin

mmlore: The warriors of the Lyrata melted in their
suits of gleaming bronze, entombed in monuments
to their own folly.
Melded Bronzeskin-3.name: Melded Bronzeskin

mmlore: The warriors of the Lyrata melted in their
suits of gleaming bronze, entombed in monuments
to their own folly.
Melded Bronzeskin-4.name: Melded Bronzeskin

mmlore: <dark_gray>Moqqil entered the underbelly of the human
<dark_gray>settlement known as Lier with a mission. Their
<dark_gray>God, known as Sobbetmar, was no God. It was
<dark_gray>a beast, chosen by Life to dominate minds.
<dark_gray>If this budding civilization wanted to continue,
<dark_gray>the crocodile must be captured.
Moqqil's Tarnished Legguards-2.name: Moqqil's Tarnished Legguards

mmlore: <dark_gray>Moqqil entered the underbelly of the human
<dark_gray>settlement known as Lier with a mission. Their
<dark_gray>God, known as Sobbetmar, was no God. It was
<dark_gray>a beast, chosen by Life to dominate minds.
<dark_gray>If this budding civilization wanted to continue,

Moqqil's Tarnished Legguards-3.name: Moqqil's Tarnished Legguards

mmlore: Golden runes scar the greaves, glowing
with a heat eternal. A bittersweet
aura hangs quiet in the heart of
this inferno.
Pyrrhic Greaves.name: Pyrrhic Greaves

mmlore: Isadora opened the doors to her chambers
to see her sons waiting for her.
Her legs gave out as she hugged them both, safe.
Queen's Greaves.name: Queen's Greaves

mmlore: WHY IS IT SO BRIGHT?
MY EYES!!!
Reflective Pants.name: Reflective Pants

mmlore: He thought that nothing could touch
him, even as his world disintegrated
before his eyes.
Salazar's Greed.name: Salazar's Greed

mmlore: The blessing of Summer,
desired by all.
Sunblessed Leggings.name: Sunblessed Leggings

mmlore: Drain the life of those around you,
and you shall stand alone. Isolation
breeds enlightenment if you can bear
the weight of the results.
Wadah's Solitude.name: Wadah's Solitude

mmlore: Viridia, Gem of the Sea.
It shall stand as a beacon
of progress, eternal.
Will of the Empire.name: Will of the Empire

mmlore: One sin above the rest stands out
as the likely harbinger of the end.
Downfall.name: Downfall

mmlore: A relic from the great Bed War, once used
to shatter the dreams of sleeping soldiers...
And then to kill them.
Dreambreaker.name: Dreambreaker

mmlore: The strange metal hums
with each pulse.
Pulsating Gold Pickaxe.name: Pulsating Gold Pickaxe

mmlore: None can remember all lost
beneath the waves.
Shimmering Wave.name: Shimmering Wave

mmlore: Your recipients are sure to be
"stunned" when they open this one!
It really is such a mystery...
Shocking Gift.name: Shocking Gift

mmlore: The sky reverberates as the heavens
are torn asunder by the gods.
Skyfeller.name: Skyfeller

mmlore: None can remember what was lost
beneath THOSE waves.
Supercharged Sea.name: Supercharged Sea

mmlore: Each swing of this mighty mattock seems
to trace the constellations in its wake.
Each blow shudders the earth.
Supernova Mattock-3.name: Supernova Mattock

mmlore: Each swing of this mighty mattock seems
to trace the constellations in its wake.
Each blow shudders the earth.
Supernova Mattock-4.name: Supernova Mattock

mmlore: Sculpt the earth with a single swing.
The Earthshaker.name: The Earthshaker

mmlore: "Mana, manifesting as lightning, seems
to regularly pierce the silver barrier.
If I can harness that energy..."
The Overclocker-2.name: The Overclocker

mmlore: "Mana, manifesting as lightning, seems
to regularly pierce the silver barrier.
If I can harness that energy..."
The Overclocker-3.name: The Overclocker

mmlore: "Mana, manifesting as lightning, seems
to regularly pierce the silver barrier.
If I can harness that energy..."
The Overclocker-4.name: The Overclocker

mmlore: The strange metal hums
with each pulse.
Pulsating Gold Shovel.name: Pulsating Gold Shovel

mmlore: The shovel of champions.
Spleef Shovel.name: Spleef Shovel

mmlore: A blade so thin it slices reality's threads.
Careless handling begets calamity.
Accident Prone.name: Accident Prone

mmlore: Even the weight of the ocean cannot
quench life's embers.
Agriva.name: Agriva

mmlore: It is perhaps fears that stick
strongest in the mind.
Arachnidruid Cutlass.name: Arachnidruid Cutlass

mmlore: A snide weapon, etched with clashes of
would-be heroes. With no rider to wield it,
another scourge will take his mantle.
Blade of the Lost.name: Blade of the Lost

mmlore: Only a dribble was needed, but
why waste a fine artery?
Bloodletter's Dagger.name: Bloodletter's Dagger

mmlore: Only obtainable by those proven to be
balanced in every virtue.
Bouquet of Gold.name: Bouquet of Gold

mmlore: All will be twisted by his might. To be
remade to the will of the Jungle.
Corrupted Geomantic Dagger.name: Corrupted Geomantic Dagger

mmlore: Like the hanging crystals above the
Argone fortress, the prisms in your
hand refract magic beautifully.
Crystalline Dirk.name: Crystalline Dirk

mmlore: Those sent into the temple were
doomed from the start.
Doom's Edge.name: Doom's Edge

mmlore: With blade from aeons past, swiftly,
they shall breathe their last.
Dragonbone Dagger.name: Dragonbone Dagger

mmlore: With blade from aeons past, swiftly,
they shall rawr their last.
Enderdragon Dagger.name: Enderdragon Dagger

mmlore: <dark_gray>A mighty sword, ripped free from stone.
Excalibur.name: Excalibur

mmlore: The Jungle's own wrath overcame
the power Cazol held over the Sons
of the Forest. Exien's fervor became
Kaul's own fury.
Exien's Sheath.name: Exien's Sheath

mmlore: Used in many top-secret experiments. Sadly,
not all involved explosions.
Geomantic Dagger.name: Geomantic Dagger

mmlore: Fashioned from fragile glass, adorned with
a symbol that tugs at your memory.
Glass Dagger.name: Glass Dagger

mmlore: Greed has only one road - to the grave.
Greedy Sword.name: Greedy Sword

mmlore: A righteous flame rekindled.
Hallowed Gladius.name: Hallowed Gladius

mmlore: The power of extreme experience,
manifest into a physical form.
Intellect Incarnate.name: Intellect Incarnate

mmlore: What does it mean to be alive? Is it
flesh? Blood? Is it a pulsing core
within your chest? In Irrus' final
moments, she realized... It is not the
Architect by which she defined her
life, but her own memories.
Irrus' Memory-2.name: Irrus' Memory

mmlore: What does it mean to be alive? Is it
flesh? Blood? Is it a pulsing core
within your chest? In Irrus' final
moments, she realized... It is not the
Architect by which she defined her
life, but her own memories.
Irrus' Memory-3.name: Irrus' Memory

mmlore: What does it mean to be alive? Is it
flesh? Blood? Is it a pulsing core
within your chest? In Irrus' final
moments, she realized... It is not the
Architect by which she defined her
life, but her own memories.
Irrus' Memory-4.name: Irrus' Memory

mmlore: The deeds of that evil beast
they call a shaman must not
go unpunished.
Justice will be had.
Isadora's Justice.name: Isadora's Justice

mmlore: The first to fall will be the King.
The Empire will follow.
Kingslayer.name: Kingslayer

mmlore: The first to fall will be the King.
The Empire will follow.
Kingslayer-3.name: Kingslayer

mmlore: The first to fall will be the King.
The Empire will follow.
Kingslayer-4.name: Kingslayer

mmlore: A memory of light, still shining,
calling for a master.
Light of Salvation.name: Light of Salvation

mmlore: Only for the riches? Simply not true.
We live for the risk, the thrill, the possibility
of losing it all. Such is the soul of gambling.
Luck of the Draw.name: Luck of the Draw

mmlore: As fragile as the truth
in immortality.
Monshee's Judgement.name: Monshee's Judgement

mmlore: Precise hits mean nothing with
a rapier this sharp.
Myriad's Rapier.name: Myriad's Rapier

mmlore: Layers of barbs and plating reveal
the horrifying truth - the cruel
reality of a monster.
Nettlegold Shiv.name: Nettlegold Shiv

mmlore: <bold><yellow>Taking this item outside of the dungeon
<bold><yellow>will instead drop it in the dungeon.
Nox Sacramentum.name: Nox Sacramentum

mmlore: For when sharpening the tips of your
candy canes is no longer enough.
Peppermint Punisher.name: Peppermint Punisher

mmlore: Memories rise from the ashes, but
fade like embers in the night.
Phoenix Spellblade.name: Phoenix Spellblade

mmlore: The greatest power of man is to write
their own history. The greatest tragedy
is for those words to be washed away
by uncaring waves.
Quill of the Emperor.name: Quill of the Emperor

mmlore: The power of total truth,
manifest into a physical form.
Salvation Incarnate.name: Salvation Incarnate

mmlore: The Mycelia distilled the nearby cave crystals into
pure, life-granting mana. Only through this process
could they create more of their own.
Samsara Vessel-0.name: Samsara Vessel

could they create more of their own.

mmlore: Donned by the royal guard of the Den dynasty.
Those struck by the blade are said to disappear
into the endless sands of time.
Sandblaster.name: Sandblaster

mmlore: This sword feels familiar. The faintest
trace of blood calls to you through memories
lost to the emptiness beyond.
Silver Tithe.name: Silver Tithe

mmlore: Despite the unrefined nature of the
acid extracted from the human soul,
the Machine found that combining it
with copper formed quite the potent alloy.
Soulcopper Defender-2.name: Soulcopper Defender

mmlore: Despite the unrefined nature of the
acid extracted from the human soul,
the Machine found that combining it
with copper formed quite the potent alloy.
Soulcopper Defender-3.name: Soulcopper Defender

acid extracted from the human soul,

Soulcopper Defender-4.name: Soulcopper Defender

mmlore: The Jungle's venom seeps
into all wounds.
Soulvenom Dagger.name: Soulvenom Dagger

mmlore: Evermore burns the flame of pact.
By Crimson glow, the Veil attacked.
Grow and feed on poor contract.

mmlore: Tavern tales in Mistport speak of a storm that

The walkers yet to dream?
Their footsteps make valleys.
Their lifeblood forms the streams.
Old Ice Brogues.name: Old Ice Brogues

mmlore: The Emperor stepped into the
perfectly preserved citadel, and
approached the shriveled Tree of Life.
At his touch, the wood erupted
into a buzz of Energy.
When it subsided, only Shades remained.
Pelias' Last Step-1.name: Pelias' Last Step

with the deep. Take heed, for the deep
is not merciful, and may not let go
of those in her grasp.
Seafloor's Sabatons.name: Seafloor's Sabatons

mmlore: Legends throughout the empire tell
of a great calamity that took place
near what we now know as The Nadir.
A battle most fierce that the earth
itself shook in horror.
Silence of Space-2.name: Silence of Space

<dark_gray>It could be displaced, but it had to end
<dark_gray>up somewhere.

his gift would finally end it all.
Winter's March.name: Winter's March

the title of Adept, though their Iridium
plate stood as austere as that of newly-made
knights. Efficiency was valued above all else.

blighted pods fell inert. With the
right craftsmanship, they have
become something more.

<dark_gray>engraved into the metal. Something about
<dark_gray>it whispers hatred.

The fragment is inscribed with thousands of rings,
and splints like the leshen bark of the Wolfswood.
He had remained bound to this earthly prison.
Effulgent Fragment-4.name: Effulgent Fragment

mmlore: <dark_gray>Beneath the ice, a heavy heart still beats
<dark_gray>the rhythm of the song he must sing alone.
Frost Giant's Courage.name: Frost Giant's Courage

mmlore: And lo, did Alric's spear pierce true.
And still his armor held, cracked and battered.
Heart of the Hero.name: Heart of the Hero

mmlore: The metal itself seems prepared to spring
into action at a breath, yet rests as if
it is all it has ever known.
Iridium Breastplate.name: Iridium Breastplate

mmlore: Along the Ring for centuries the brilliant
empire reigned alone, until a king
who'd turned from God sought power
underneath the stone.
Pelias' Warden-1.name: Pelias' Warden

mmlore: Now, as the embrace of death finally
comes for me, I do understand why life
is so short. I have taken many lifetimes
to learn that sometimes it is better.
Rapture.name: Rapture

mmlore: The runes inscribed upon the metal
emit a powerful aura. Let them guide
you to a brighter future.
Seer's Runeplate.name: Seer's Runeplate

mmlore: Immaculate silver that lines the luminous garment
recalls a past of the Silver Empire's legacy.
Each fragment lost, found yet again.
Silver Armament-2.name: Silver Armament

recalls a past of the Silver Empire's legacy.

us your gift. Grant us blood
and flame and we will hold
your seal eternal.
Silverthread Raiment.name: Silverthread Raiment

mmlore: <dark_gray>Few have stepped outside the protection of
<dark_gray>the Veil. Those who did took great precautions
<dark_gray>to ensure their return.

<dark_gray>magic in the air up here makes it harder
<dark_gray>to breathe...
<dark_gray>breathe... in... breathe... out...

mmlore: "Rocks fall, everyone dies.
Unless you're wearing your hard hat!"
- Foreman Jorge.
Excavator's Hardlamp.name: Excavator's Hardlamp

mmlore: Even in the bleakest storm,
I will stand as queen.
Frog Queen's Tiara.name: Frog Queen's Tiara

mmlore: As you place this frozen crown on
your head, you feel the weight of
an ancient violence and the hum
of an even older song.
Frost Giant's Crown.name: Frost Giant's Crown

mmlore: Give this to a moderator in exchange
for 80 casino chips!
Frost Giant's Party Hat.name: Frost Giant's Party Hat

a hand to guide that ancient land. From
legacy of knights long lost grew godly
right to take command.

mmlore: As Faraheim's people cowered in fear, as reality
tore open around them, another battle raged
far beyond their understanding. The gnashing
teeth, the unblinking eyes of the unknowable ones
waited with bated breath. Waited, for Her Judgement.
Judgement of the Outer World-4.name: Judgement of the Outer World

mmlore: Patience - to hide and to wait.
That is the nature of the hunt.
Mask of the Interim.name: Mask of the Interim

mmlore: From within, dozens of bone plates shift and
grind into place, twisting any semblance of
coherent speech into dismal noise.

his power, those ancient prisons of still-older
minds would save him. But they too had fallen
before Silver wrath.

mmlore: Despite the grisly origin of the
Machine's endless movement, the air
within was serene; the wind imbibed with
a pleasant scent.
Air-Purified Thresher-2.name: Air-Purified Thresher

mmlore: In the wee hours of the night,
even practitioners of the dark
arts make time for sweets.
Arcane Confection.name: Arcane Confection

mmlore: In the end, they were cut down one by one...
a worthy song for such traitors.
Blasphemer's Sickle.name: Blasphemer's Sickle

mmlore: Each swing drinks deeply of
the magic flooding the very
air of the fallen Forum.
Bloody Fang.name: Bloody Fang

mmlore: Forged within the halls of a mighty bastion,
the scythe still carries the frozen winds
of a foreign land.
Coldsteel Blunt.name: Coldsteel Blunt

mmlore: "Two worlds in a lullaby, neither alike.
What might happen if we weave them together?
Now watch as both twine together into one."
Fateweaver.name: Fateweaver

mmlore: When work was done a rest deserved,
so slumber did these gods. But soon
the waking ones did rise and for
their power clawed.
Frost Giant's Crescent.name: Frost Giant's Crescent

mmlore: The scythe, relinquished through
many tavern gambles, seems to bring
fortune to its owner... until their
luck runs out.
Gambler's Cane.name: Gambler's Cane

mmlore: It takes great knowledge to supersede
biology, but even greater wisdom to
understand the consequences.
Gillman's Claw.name: Gillman's Claw

mmlore: Misty taste of Moonshine,
teardrops in my eye...
Hightide Moonshine.name: Hightide Moonshine

mmlore: Nothing known can cut the True Ice, yet
this tooth slices through like a hot knife!
Surely this is of use to our archeologists!
Hrimnir's Incisor.name: Hrimnir's Incisor

mmlore: Too ancient for the plights of her mortal
followers, the will of the all-mother is
executed by the council. As she is absolute,
so too are those four.
Hycenea's Will-0.name: Hycenea's Will

daughter. Now you may use it to protect others.
Iron Pipe.name: Iron Pipe

mmlore: Keep on goin' 'til you get someplace
where you can truly rest.
Longtime Sunshine.name: Longtime Sunshine

mmlore: Molten rock or molten chocolate;
with temperatures like these
it doesn't matter what it was.
Magma Cake.name: Magma Cake

mmlore: Crack the sky with a scattered beam.
Mirrorshard Scythe.name: Mirrorshard Scythe

mmlore: The Captain was gone, taken deeper into
the island's maw. The rest were left above,
now driven mad by unquenchable greed.
Mutiny.name: Mutiny

mmlore: Hydrothermal calcification formed an explosive
mineral used here, carefully affixed, but
not so carefully swung.
Phlogiston Fissure.name: Phlogiston Fissure

blade resonates with an energy sealed
deep beneath the earth.

their legions.

those who hunt for vaults.

Those are the qualities that separate a
Captain from a flailing crewman.
Outer Rim Fragment.name: Outer Rim Fragment

mmlore: A trophy awarded to the
#2 submission in the Monumenta
2020 Screenshot Competition.
Silver Camera.name: Silver Camera

mmlore: Tyranny, fratricide, mad searching for the lost
relics of the Silver Knights concealed one
simple truth. Ambitious attempts to revive the
great Silvari empire were not meant to succeed.

the lightweight nature of Iridium granting
them an elegance and alacrity rarely seen

A soul, corrupted by their power.

<dark_gray>untouched by the ants below his feet.

mmlore: Strength and resolve are the only things
that endure in the Chillwind Tundra.
Frost Knight's Greaves.name: Frost Knight's Greaves

mmlore: Garrisons of Witchknights were sent by Hycenea
to defend Harrakfar from being taken by the
Silver Order. Deep gashes upon the greaves
evoke memories of the Knights' violent magic,
against the tempered steel of the Coven.
Greaves of Sunken Faith-4.name: Greaves of Sunken Faith

mmlore: As the scourge of battle beset the land,
the hammers turned to swords.
Ice was shaped to armor
as the giants stood for war.

elegance to tranquility earned. There
is a power to patience.

his men to cleave the earth until he'd
found that power lost- yet from it,
he would gain no worth.

slowly fading away.

Silver Remnant.name: Silver Remnant

mmlore: Strike while the rocks are warm, for a
city must be built. A haven, void of war.
A gift to the world.
Adze of the Ebb.name: Adze of the Ebb

mmlore: Enhanced to the point of brilliant
precision. Unfortunately, that precision
has a price.
Aquatic Adze.name: Aquatic Adze

mmlore: The skies trembled and the ground quaked,
but the vanguard pushed on.
Blitzkrieg.name: Blitzkrieg

mmlore: Hunger courses through the veins
of this plantlike pick. Turn it
to your benefit - or else.
Dionaeas Graft.name: Dionaeas Graft

mmlore: The Sons of the Forest's dig to Kaul was
never meant to succeed. Cazol had other plans.
He needed the Genius Loci furious. It was
time to wake the nightmare.
Forest's Gambit (axe).name: Forest's Gambit

mmlore: The Sons of the Forest's dig to Kaul was
never meant to succeed. Cazol had other plans.
He needed the Genius Loci furious. It was
time to wake the nightmare.
Forest's Gambit (pickaxe).name: Forest's Gambit

mmlore: The longboats arrived upon fresh
shores. Soon, Johannes' people would
build a new home. A safe haven for
the Narsen people.
King's Dolabra (axe).name: King's Dolabra

mmlore: The longboats arrived upon fresh
shores. Soon, Johannes' people would
build a new home. A safe haven for
the Narsen people.
King's Dolabra (pickaxe).name: King's Dolabra

mmlore: Your blood. Your bones. Your strength.
It all shall go to serve the Pharaohs.
This is what happens when filth defies
the chosen.
Molta's Labor.name: Molta's Labor

mmlore: Burn by the poison of the
deadly nightshade.
Nightshade Pickaxe.name: Nightshade Pickaxe

mmlore: The Voice is worship; Follow the Inner
path; Speak only in True Need.
Notched Pickaxe.name: Notched Pickaxe

mmlore: Fashioned from a conduit, the metal
pulses with the same energy.
Ocean's Bounty.name: Ocean's Bounty

mmlore: <dark_gray>Isadora had done all she had wanted to do.
<dark_gray>Eleven years of peace. A strong family.
<dark_gray>An Empire worthy of Abeliar. It was time now
<dark_gray>to give control to her eldest son. He would
<dark_gray>carry on her legacy. Of this she was sure.
Queen's Dolabra (axe).name: Queen's Dolabra

mmlore: Handle with care.
Red Hot Pickaxe.name: Red Hot Pickaxe

mmlore: <dark_gray>A gift from our Lord On High
<dark_gray>rests below. Break through the
<dark_gray>ice and bask in the light of eternity.
<dark_gray>As you sink, you soon too will see.
Shattershine.name: Shattershine

mmlore: From the highest peak, all
else appears miniscule.
Summit's Conquest.name: Summit's Conquest

mmlore: With creation comes necessary
destruction.
Worldshaper's Staff (axe).name: Worldshaper's Staff

mmlore: With creation comes necessary
destruction.

Morphic Breaker (axe).name: Morphic Breaker

mmlore: Bend and break.

Its gentle rhythm mimics that of breathing, or a heartbeat.
Something is alive within.

mmlore: <dark_gray>The whispers had drawn Aggripa into the
<dark_gray>smoldering Forge below Antium, but there
<dark_gray>was a horror hidden below he had not
<dark_gray>anticipated - an Exhibitor, while the Knights
<dark_gray>above marched on another land.
Aggripa's Gearshredder-2.name: Aggripa's Gearshredder

mmlore: <dark_gray>The whispers had drawn Aggripa into the
<dark_gray>smoldering Forge below Antium, but there
<dark_gray>was a horror hidden below he had not
<dark_gray>anticipated - an Exhibitor, while the Knights

mmlore: Strength lies not only with brute force,
but the ability to control it. Such is
the wisdom of the Son of Flame.
Akam's Ferocity.name: Akam's Ferocity

mmlore: Kokytos, we see The Revelation of Alei.
The arc of history bends towards the will of your Prophets.
The sky will shatter soon enough -
and descend upon the sinful.
Alei's Arc.name: Alei's Arc

mmlore: Arcane flames dance off of the steel,
burning with intensity but emitting
no heat. The blade stays lit even when
plunged into the sea.
Amaranth Blade.name: Amaranth Blade

mmlore: A relic of The Architect being here is an
alarming find. What could have brought this
here - and why was it needed?
Architect's Dagger.name: Architect's Dagger

mmlore: After Markus' mother died, he was expelled from the manor.
Pelias' lack of use for him saved him from consumption.
Despite his failure, the Architect had spared him.
He would spend the rest of his life in penance.
Argentum Arbitrium-2.name: Argentum Arbitrium

mmlore: After Markus' mother died, he was expelled from the manor.
Pelias' lack of use for him saved him from consumption.
Despite his failure, the Architect had spared him.
He would spend the rest of his life in penance.
Argentum Arbitrium-3.name: Argentum Arbitrium

mmlore: After Markus' mother died, he was expelled from the manor.
Pelias' lack of use for him saved him from consumption.
Despite his failure, the Architect had spared him.
He would spend the rest of his life in penance.
Argentum Arbitrium-4.name: Argentum Arbitrium

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Too large to properly wield.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>It's covered in ash...
Ashed Zweihnder.name: Ashed Zweihnder

mmlore: We shall descend upon this city and
show these savages true power.
Beastblight Machete.name: Beastblight Machete

mmlore: Silence fell over the Blackflame as the
Beast struck. He would pay for his choice,
but so too would the innocents.
Betrayer of the Blackflame.name: Betrayer of the Blackflame

mmlore: A replica of a cursed yet powerful
blade. A slight trail of silver arcs
through the air as you swing it.
Blade of Exaltation.name: Blade of Exaltation

mmlore: <dark_gray>The Dichen offered the Narsen Crew
<dark_gray>support in the assault on the Masked
<dark_gray>hideout. In the process, bonds would
<dark_gray>be forged and Masks would be broken.
Blade of Reclamation-2.name: Blade of Reclamation

mmlore: <dark_gray>The Dichen offered the Narsen Crew
<dark_gray>support in the assault on the Masked
<dark_gray>hideout. In the process, bonds would
<dark_gray>be forged and Masks would be broken.
Blade of Reclamation-3.name: Blade of Reclamation

<dark_gray>hideout. In the process, bonds would
<dark_gray>be forged and Masks would be broken.
Blade of Reclamation-4.name: Blade of Reclamation

mmlore: Let the blood of the lesser ...make
an excellent dipping sauce.
Bloodthirsty Croissant.name: Bloodthirsty Croissant

mmlore: Bring them to their knees.
Bloom.name: Bloom

mmlore: <dark_gray>There must be a way to reshape the bones.
<dark_gray>The magic within longs to be shaped anew.
Bonebender.name: Bonebender

mmlore: A broken sheath, could be repaired.
Broken Sheath.name: Broken Sheath

mmlore: A broken blade, could be repaired.
Broken Sword.name: Broken Sword

mmlore: There is only one thing left to
do. Claim what is hers.
Broken Will.name: Broken Will

mmlore: A ceremonial blade for soldiers that
descend from foreign lands.
Celsian Heraldic Blade.name: Celsian Heraldic Blade

mmlore: Not a step back, impale the marauders
upon this line!
Celsian Sarissa.name: Celsian Sarissa

mmlore: Bathed in the pools of Kokytos beneath the
ice, the next Prophet waits. With His breath,
the binds of frost and sky will shatter.
His word will be revealed.
Chainbreaker's Blight.name: Chainbreaker's Blight

mmlore: A name so legendary it
transcends realms.
Chunchunmaru.name: Chunchunmaru

mmlore: A relic from the past.
Powerful, yet still corrupted.
<light_purple>* Quest Item *
Cleansed Blade of Exaltation.name: Cleansed Blade of Exaltation

mmlore: A relic from the past. It still holds
great power despite its corruption.
<light_purple>* Quest Item *
Destroyed Blade of Exaltation.name: Destroyed Blade of Exaltation

mmlore: Nothing should change what must happen.
This dagger did.
Dissonant Dagger.name: Dissonant Dagger

mmlore: Indeed, it was like a
heap of raw iron.
Eclipse Splitter.name: Eclipse Splitter

mmlore: Magical energy whirs around the
blade, forming a hurricane with
which to smite your foes.
Energized Maelstrom.name: Energized Maelstrom

mmlore: With reflexes awakened,
much more is lost.
Enlightened Dagger.name: Enlightened Dagger

mmlore: A faint glow emerges from the carnage.
The fury of steel, silenced, but not forgotten.
Firefly's Rush.name: Firefly's Rush

mmlore: A faint song echoes through the storming
snow. Another Waker has fallen.
Flurried Echoes.name: Flurried Echoes

mmlore: So out set Alric, brave and strong,
his steel clutched tight in hand. The
icy chill would gnaw his bones, but
blood was his demand.
Frost Giant's Greatsword.name: Frost Giant's Greatsword

mmlore: Balance. Harmony. Unity. All entwined,
for the good of all.
Harmonic Wrath.name: Harmonic Wrath

mmlore: It's easy to strike first when one
is as old as life itself.
Harrakfar's Claw-0.name: Harrakfar's Claw

mmlore: It's easy to strike first when one
is as old as life itself.
Harrakfar's Claw-1.name: Harrakfar's Claw

mmlore: It's easy to strike first when one
is as old as life itself.
Harrakfar's Claw-4.name: Harrakfar's Claw

mmlore: The engravings on the rapier
hum with elemental power.
Heiress' Rapier.name: Heiress' Rapier

mmlore: The blade's edge is stained a reddish-brown
copper. The blood still left is worn
as a trophy.
Mage Hunter's Blade.name: Mage Hunter's Blade

mmlore: The metal is covered in notches, where thousands
of swords have struck - then shattered into
fragments of pure magic.
Magistruct Breaker.name: Magistruct Breaker

mmlore: The weapon itself is living. A
symbiotic relationship between
biology and metallurgy.
Metamorphosis.name: Metamorphosis

mmlore: From a message in a moonbeam,
the Lord's true name was revealed.
Engraved into the ice blade:
Kokytos.
Moonbeam Dagger.name: Moonbeam Dagger

mmlore: <dark_gray>Time marches on, no matter how long
<dark_gray>the citadel has sat silent. Even now the
<dark_gray>clock hands still creak as life stirs nearby.
Moonscarred Clockblade-1.name: Moonscarred Clockblade

mmlore: <dark_gray>Time marches on, no matter how long

mmlore: Renowned for her clarity of mind,
Nalatia's leadership was invaluable
to the Coven during the darkest years
of Silvari expansion.
Nalatia's Galeblade-1.name: Nalatia's Galeblade

mmlore: Renowned for her clarity of mind,
Nalatia's leadership was invaluable
to the Coven during the darkest years
of Silvari expansion.

mmlore: Like the night, cold and brutal.
Nightfall.name: Nightfall

mmlore: <dark_gray>A weapon from a bygone era.
<dark_gray>It seems powerless for now, but
<dark_gray>perhaps it could be enhanced.
<light_purple>* Quest Item *
<dark_gray>#Q212I01
Nilpotent Spear.name: Nilpotent Spear

mmlore: Vitality flourishes despite the oppressive
heat. The gift of Iza is no mirage.
Oasis Scimitar.name: Oasis Scimitar

mmlore: The blade feels lithe and powerful, despite the moss.
Silvari elegance and Coven magics, fused into one.
Overgrown Bodkin-0.name: Overgrown Bodkin

mmlore: The blade feels lithe and powerful, despite the moss.
Silvari elegance and Coven magics, fused into one.
Overgrown Bodkin-1.name: Overgrown Bodkin

mmlore: The keen edge draws more
than just blood.
Phantom Cutlass.name: Phantom Cutlass

mmlore: Together, we are more.
Plebian Warblade.name: Plebian Warblade

mmlore: Attuning to a potion allows for instant
drinking if the potion is present in
your inventory (non-hotbar) or stored
within the Potion Injector.
<gray>Operated using <key:key.attack/> while in main hand.
<gray><key:key.sneak> + <key:key.swapOffhand> to clear current potion.
Potion Injector (black shulker box).name: Potion Injector

mmlore: A strange syringe for quick potion
use with specially designed vials.
Potion Injector (iron_sword).name: Potion Injector

mmlore: Its form was lost in the tranformation,
but perhaps this monstrosity once
held beauty in its maw.
Putrid Maw.name: Putrid Maw

mmlore: <dark_gray>Each swing clicks dangerously along a
<dark_gray>predefined path none can hope to follow.
Regulated Cogblade-2.name: Regulated Cogblade

mmlore: <dark_gray>Each swing clicks dangerously along a

mmlore: <dark_gray>Swinging this blade beckons power from
<dark_gray>beneath the waves that shouldn't ever
<dark_gray>have been disturbed again...
Seafarer's Rapier-1.name: Seafarer's Rapier

mmlore: <dark_gray>Swinging this blade beckons power from
