mmlore: Right click in hand or inventory to guarantee
the Shadowdancer tree as one of the
options at the beginning of the dungeon.
Requires purchase from trader to use.
Left click in hand to reset preference.
Shadowdancer Talisman.name: Shadowdancer Talisman

mmlore: Right click in hand or inventory to guarantee
the Shadowdancer tree as one of the
options at the beginning of the dungeon.
Requires purchase from trader to use.
Left click in hand to reset preference.
Shadowdancer Talisman (Zenith).name: Shadowdancer Talisman (Zenith)

mmlore: The last remnants of a fallen crew,
swallowed by the beyond.
Shipwrecker's Sabre.name: Shipwrecker's Sabre

mmlore: <dark_gray>The blade is stained with a silvery
<dark_gray>substance, left from when you pulled the
<dark_gray>blade from the body of the Silver Knight.
Silver Knight's Failure.name: Silver Knight's Failure

mmlore: A good ol' prod, it's still quite hot!
Stablemaster's Prod.name: Stablemaster's Prod

mmlore: On one end lies the halls of Wonder.
The seas fascinate the mind,
but there is danger in its beauty.
Steel Maelstrom.name: Steel Maelstrom

mmlore: A shield? Best not to rely on one. After
all, no one can parry a dragon's tail
or a manticore's claws.
Studded Gauntlet.name: Studded Gauntlet

mmlore: Like the day, warm and forgiving.
Sunrise.name: Sunrise

mmlore: Not to be confused with the
obsidian swordfish!
Swordfish.name: Swordfish

mmlore: The currents gather around the points of the lance.
Far away, an eye opens...
Thalassic Lance.name: Thalassic Lance

mmlore: It was much too big to
be called a sword.
The Struggler.name: The Struggler

mmlore: Must be taken to the peak of the east,
or the peak of the west.
Time's Passage.name: Time's Passage

mmlore: Good may not always triumph, but I'll take
the company of knights and heroes to that
of knaves and scoundrels any day.
Tournament Longsword.name: Tournament Longsword

mmlore: The Black Mist's raiders have
come through the flood to
plunder your treasure and
spill your blood.
Treasured Rapier.name: Treasured Rapier

mmlore: Unearthed from a nearby dig site, the
frigid permafrost has been shaped into
a more manageable weapon.
True Ice Splinter.name: True Ice Splinter

mmlore: You'll thank me when everyone else has
stomach aches and cavities.
Tube of Toothpaste.name: Tube of Toothpaste

mmlore: It's just missing one thing...
Unfinished Rapier.name: Unfinished Rapier

mmlore: The bloody edge draws from Beyond
this world. She is coming.
Unwavering Will.name: Unwavering Will

mmlore: If the threats to New Antium were true,
the Machine God would have to get
through the defense of the Silver Codex
first.
Will of the Codex-1.name: Will of the Codex

mmlore: If the threats to New Antium were true,
the Machine God would have to get
through the defense of the Silver Codex
first.
Will of the Codex-2.name: Will of the Codex

mmlore: If the threats to New Antium were true,
the Machine God would have to get
through the defense of the Silver Codex
first.
Will of the Codex-3.name: Will of the Codex

mmlore: If the threats to New Antium were true,
the Machine God would have to get
through the defense of the Silver Codex
first.
Will of the Codex-4.name: Will of the Codex

mmlore: Looks like we're gonna be doing
this the hard way.
Wilt.name: Wilt

mmlore: <dark_gray>The researchers were always sad to see
a plant put down. Mostly because
euthanasia required being a bit too
close for comfort.
Wilting Agent.name: Wilting Agent

mmlore: A record player, enhanced
by power incomprehensible...
<gray><key:key.attack/> while in main hand or
<gray><key:key.use/> in an inventory to open
<gray>the menu and select a song to play.
Soulsinger.name: Soulsinger

mmlore: A traditional Tlaxan record player.
The music it plays is almost magical...
<gray><key:key.attack/> while in main hand or
<gray><key:key.use/> in an inventory to open
<gray>the menu and select a song to play.
Tlaxan Record Player.name: Tlaxan Record Player

mmlore: The sprawling ruins of Ta'Ferna and the
corrupted Soulbinder stand against you.
<dark_red>Completion of Shurima's Big Day Off is required
<dark_red>and end-game gear is recommended for this Strike!
<gray>This Strike requires the collection of
<gray>Souls to progress to the final boss.
<gray>Quick thinking and fast play are required.
<aqua>Players: 1-6 (One life per player)
Grants access to the Forsworn Sanctum Strike.
Forsworn Key.name: Forsworn Key

mmlore: The time has come to enter the Inner Sanctum.
<dark_red>This Strike contains a mid-game challenge. Completion
<dark_red>of Unveiled is required and a group of 1-4 players
<dark_red>in mid-to-end game gear is recommended for this Strike.
<aqua>Players: 1-4 (Infinite attempts)
Grants access to the Inner Sanctum Story Strike.
Inner Sanctum Key.name: Inner Sanctum Key

mmlore: A helm once required to access
The Sons of the Forest's Sanctum.
Mistleaf Hood.name: Mistleaf Hood

mmlore: We need more trees!
Chimarian Wand.name: Chimarian Wand

mmlore: The Sanctum is empty. Kaul is gone. He no longer
replies to my calls, and the leaves within this
place have begun to wilt. My mind feels empty.
I am no longer the Soulspeaker for Kaul. I am useless.
<bold><yellow>Taking this item outside of the dungeon
<bold><yellow>will instead drop it in the dungeon.
Corrupted Key 4.name: Corrupted Key 4

mmlore: Legends speak of a mighty power, earned
only if one kisses you below the bloom.
Sadly, nobody seems to want to.
Sprig of Mistletoe.name: Sprig of Mistletoe

mmlore: ...But even the most hidden places can
be found within the Memory.
Willowtwist Memory.name: Willowtwist Memory

mmlore: With every ruin of man
plants will soon take back
what was originally theirs.
Basil Leaf.name: Basil Leaf

mmlore: How could something like this ever exist?
Truly, the world is an amazing place.
Space-bending Leaf.name: Space-bending Leaf

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>This is... money? I think?
Tlaxan Currency?.name: Tlaxan Currency?

mmlore: Many attempted the arduous climb, yet
you ascended the trail of temperance.
Given to those who did not abuse the Zenith
revive exploit before it was patched.
Ladder of Honesty.name: Ladder of Honesty

mmlore: "This place terrifies me. I knew what
I was getting into, of course, but
actually witnessing the Veil is
an experience I could never prepare
for. My light is lost. Will I too be lost?"
Fallen Lantern.name: Fallen Lantern

mmlore: Saia's Grace had claimed another mind,
forever imprisoned beneath the ashes
and the clay. Beneath the sands and
stones of Ishnir.
Flame of Fallen Grace.name: Flame of Fallen Grace

mmlore: Encased in crystal's hold,
Moon fragment shall decree.
A Prophecy fortold,
May peaceful light guide thee.
Prophetic Moonbeam.name: Prophetic Moonbeam

mmlore: The Black Mist rolls forth,
calling to unsuspecting heroes.
<dark_red>Completion of The End Chimes is required and
<dark_red>4+ players are recommended for this Strike!
<gray>This Strike requires breaking spawners
<gray>to progress to the final boss.
<aqua>Players: 1-6 (One life per player)
Grants access to The Black Mist Strike.
Soulfire Lantern.name: Soulfire Lantern

mmlore: The ability to do.
Means.name: Means

mmlore: The gem seems to flicker with the light of dying Stars...
but perhaps its radiance can be restored.
Bring to The Rionnagfaire to unlock its full potential.
Flickering Gem.name: Flickering Gem

mmlore: <gray>Epic Crafting Material
An especially dense crsytal cluster suffused
with Harmony. The crystals resonate with a
pleasant hum, the sound of each one seeming
to blend perfectly with the others.
Harmonic Crystalline Cluster.name: Harmonic Crystalline Cluster

mmlore: Words of power are contained within this stone.
No matter which angle you look at it from,
you can see the moon in its reflection.
This night, it shines particularly brightly.
<light_purple>* Quest Item *
Moonbound Gleamstone.name: Moonbound Gleamstone

mmlore: <dark_gray>A scrap of armor covered in blood. It could be
<dark_gray>used to trace the steps of the invaders.
<light_purple>* Quest Item *
<dark_gray>#Q36I03
Bloodied Leathers.name: Bloodied Leathers

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>A large cut of durable hide.
Polar Bear Hide.name: Polar Bear Hide

mmlore: "Their twisted forms... this is the
power we need to win this war."
Shapeshifter's Gauntlet.name: Shapeshifter's Gauntlet

mmlore: Rapid dispersal of aether in concentrated forms
was essential if the Machine wished to see its
Utopia to fruition. It dared not waste even a second.
Aether Threads-2.name: Aether Threads

mmlore: Rapid dispersal of aether in concentrated forms
was essential if the Machine wished to see its
Utopia to fruition. It dared not waste even a second.
Aether Threads-3.name: Aether Threads

mmlore: Rapid dispersal of aether in concentrated forms
was essential if the Machine wished to see its
Utopia to fruition. It dared not waste even a second.
Aether Threads-4.name: Aether Threads

mmlore: Power cannot be contained when it
flows like the river itself.
Aquiren's Boots.name: Aquiren's Boots

mmlore: The bark of the Gateway Tree didn't have
the spacial abilities researchers had hoped
for. Instead, it made for quite the useful
boots, with a bite.
Bark of the Gateway Tree.name: Bark of the Gateway Tree

mmlore: <#ffffaa>Arena of Terth
Basic Leather Boots.name: Basic Leather Boots

mmlore: "The river is our blood, our nourishment, our life.
We will not let them defile it" - C'Axtal
Blackroot's Path.name: Blackroot's Path

mmlore: Reality shifts, call for help.
Reality frays, help is woven.
Reality calls, power teases.
Blackthread Boots.name: Blackthread Boots

mmlore: "I've been wounded badly. My leg
grows numb and necrotic. I fear I
will be forced to cut it off if I cannot
find a way to heal it soon. I must
press on. I will not die in this place.
Not when the world depends on me
succeeding, no matter what the others on
the council think..."
Bloodsoaked Boots.name: Bloodsoaked Boots

mmlore: A token from Psychie as she
waits for her Cupid.
Boots of Cloud Nine.name: Boots of Cloud Nine

mmlore: The aura awakened, its true
power manifest.
Boots of Vigor.name: Boots of Vigor

mmlore: There was still life to be found among
the corpses. Some had survived, twisted
beyond recognition.
Boots of Vitality.name: Boots of Vitality

mmlore: Step by step, the endless snow will
sap your energy. Even the mighty
require some support.
Chillwind Treads.name: Chillwind Treads

mmlore: There is nothing faster than fury.
Corrupted Tyrolean Boots.name: Corrupted Tyrolean Boots

mmlore: The Mycelia spores blight the ground
beneath each step. Yet in the end, Galengarde
will stand eternal.
Dichen Resolve-1.name: Dichen Resolve

mmlore: The Mycelia spores blight the ground
beneath each step. Yet in the end, Galengarde
will stand eternal.
Dichen Resolve-2.name: Dichen Resolve

mmlore: The Mycelia spores blight the ground
beneath each step. Yet in the end, Galengarde
will stand eternal.
Dichen Resolve-3.name: Dichen Resolve

mmlore: The Mycelia spores blight the ground
beneath each step. Yet in the end, Galengarde
will stand eternal.
Dichen Resolve-4.name: Dichen Resolve

mmlore: One must be swift on their feet to safely
navigate the Dunes of Ishnir.
Dune Raider's Treads.name: Dune Raider's Treads

mmlore: In the end, the Emperor fell. The Empire
fell. With it, the King fell too. The knights
returned to their master, power in hand.
But one power was missing...
Emperor's Boots.name: Emperor's Boots

mmlore: <dark_gray>With each echo, those from above are one moment
<dark_gray>closer to the source of the emptiness they
<dark_gray>know only in hunger.
Empty Echoing Steps-1.name: Empty Echoing Steps

mmlore: <dark_gray>With each echo, those from above are one moment
<dark_gray>closer to the source of the emptiness they
<dark_gray>know only in hunger.
Empty Echoing Steps-2.name: Empty Echoing Steps

mmlore: <dark_gray>With each echo, those from above are one moment
<dark_gray>closer to the source of the emptiness they
<dark_gray>know only in hunger.
Empty Echoing Steps-3.name: Empty Echoing Steps

mmlore: <dark_gray>With each echo, those from above are one moment
<dark_gray>closer to the source of the emptiness they
<dark_gray>know only in hunger.
Empty Echoing Steps-4.name: Empty Echoing Steps

mmlore: The Father sleeps.
Snow falls on the evergreens.
Balance, undisturbed.
Evergreen Boots.name: Evergreen Boots

mmlore: <bold><yellow>Taking this item outside of the dungeon
<bold><yellow>will instead drop it in the dungeon.
Explorer's Galoshes.name: Explorer's Galoshes

mmlore: The tunnels seem endless, but there was
a pattern to their madness. Soon this
mind would reveal its secrets.
Faintest Footsteps.name: Faintest Footsteps

mmlore: What horrors did those miners unearth?
What drove them to inherit the Scourge?
I shudder at what lies below.
Fleshmaddened Roots.name: Fleshmaddened Roots

mmlore: Each step sends a spike of hatred
deep into the rotting earth.
Furious Footfalls.name: Furious Footfalls

mmlore: Legend says a stubborn shoemaker
crafted these shoes during a hurricane.
Galoshes of the Waves and Winds.name: Galoshes of the Waves and Winds

mmlore: The Grove is not a place for the weak
willed. The land is cursed, they say,
by a man who wished for a Demon, and
got the Devil instead.
Grovewalker Sandals.name: Grovewalker Sandals

mmlore: Hopping mad about these numbers.
Jeweled Bunny Slippers.name: Jeweled Bunny Slippers

mmlore: A symbol of the beacon-bearer, appointed
to light the way home.
Lodestar Boots.name: Lodestar Boots

mmlore: The rhythm has been forgotten,
now torment is their only song,
howled at an uncaring moon.
Lunatic's Dance.name: Lunatic's Dance

mmlore: The rhythm has been forgotten,
now torment is their only song,
howled at an uncaring moon.
Lunatic's Dance-1.name: Lunatic's Dance

mmlore: The rhythm has been forgotten,
now torment is their only song,
howled at an uncaring moon.
Lunatic's Dance-2.name: Lunatic's Dance

now torment is their only song,

Lunatic's Dance-3.name: Lunatic's Dance

mmlore: The rhythm has been forgotten,
now torment is their only song,
howled at an uncaring moon.
Lunatic's Dance-4.name: Lunatic's Dance

mmlore: Now as the mist grew dark and deep
and the fog grew piercing eyes,
the black ship sailed through blackest night
and aboard they cried goodbyes.
Mist's Wake.name: Mist's Wake

mmlore: Delivering gifts in the harsh Chillwind
climate requires obligatory garb.
Carved runes courtesy of academic
mages is a convenient bonus too.
Mystic Snowshoes.name: Mystic Snowshoes

mmlore: Ru'Ten had failed to guard Harrakfar within the
Sanctum, a greatest shame. His power drained for
what seemed like millennia, and yet a vengeance
remained, yearning for his return.
Nature's Failure-4.name: Nature's Failure

mmlore: Whispers echo through the air,
the harrowed souls will never rest.
Night Rooster Boots.name: Night Rooster Boots

mmlore: Through sea and snow the stars have guided us.
In the distance, I see a gleaming visage.
The moonlight glows familiar.
Nightsky Treads.name: Nightsky Treads

mmlore: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence,
then, is not an act, but a habit.
Peripatetic Sandals.name: Peripatetic Sandals

mmlore: Despite the obvious signs of wear, these
boots are clean and well maintained. Words
are stitched onto the right boot's outside:
"In all these things we are more than
conquerors through him that loved us."
Pilgrimage.name: Pilgrimage

mmlore: As the mechanism whirs to life, you feel
the vitality of the ancient construct flowing
through your very soul.
Primordial Treads-1.name: Primordial Treads

mmlore: As the mechanism whirs to life, you feel
the vitality of the ancient construct flowing
through your very soul.
Primordial Treads-2.name: Primordial Treads

mmlore: As the mechanism whirs to life, you feel
the vitality of the ancient construct flowing
through your very soul.
Primordial Treads-3.name: Primordial Treads

mmlore: As the mechanism whirs to life, you feel
the vitality of the ancient construct flowing
through your very soul.
Primordial Treads-4.name: Primordial Treads

mmlore: And in the end, I will reap you.
You will welcome it.
Reaper's Boots.name: Reaper's Boots

mmlore: You stand on the shoulders of those
who came before you. Their experiences
now carve the path you are destined
to travel.
Sailwoven Sandals.name: Sailwoven Sandals

mmlore: At last, their work was done. It was
then the being appeared. This would
be the last thing the scholars saw.
The Congress was overcome.
Scholar's Shoes.name: Scholar's Shoes

mmlore: Tibia honest, it's humerus that real
skeletons aren't as receptive to our
phalang-enius puns.
Skeletal Galoshes.name: Skeletal Galoshes

mmlore: <dark_gray>An alternate reality skin where the
<dark_gray>Gateway Tree has been taken under
<dark_gray>Kaul's power and grown in the Blackroot
<dark_gray>Jungle instead of the Congress.
Sketched Bark of the Gateway Tree.name: Sketched Bark of the Gateway Tree

mmlore: "This has been a long and arduous journey...
though it is one I make out of necessity. I have
seen this sort of evil before, as well as the
the danger it presents. It must be stopped."
Snowtrodden Boots.name: Snowtrodden Boots

mmlore: Dripping not just with water,
but with the pain of those claimed
by Myrahg's madness.
Sodden Sandals.name: Sodden Sandals

mmlore: She soon came to the cold realization
of the truth. Kaul was no longer in this
place. He had forsaken them all.
Soulbinder's Combat Boots.name: Soulbinder's Combat Boots

mmlore: Typically worn by students training
their focus, the shoes provide an
exponential amplification of magic
when worn by a master.
Spellbinder's Slippers.name: Spellbinder's Slippers

mmlore: Small gusts dance around the boots.
Stormborn Boots.name: Stormborn Boots

mmlore: They seem to be woven from a familiar
material. The volatility in the air
invigorates your spirit.
Sulfuric Sandals.name: Sulfuric Sandals

mmlore: Here, the trees show no age. The stumps
are marked not with concentric bands,
but rather contain a seemingly infinite
spiral. This forest is ancient, yet timeless.
The Hollow Rings-1.name: The Hollow Rings

mmlore: Here, the trees show no age. The stumps
are marked not with concentric bands,
but rather contain a seemingly infinite
spiral. This forest is ancient, yet timeless.
The Hollow Rings-2.name: The Hollow Rings

mmlore: First she hungered for Silver blood. Then
she hungered for power within. Last she hungered
for knowledge without. Until the Corsair
finally hungered for her.
Treads of the Hungerer-1.name: Treads of the Hungerer

mmlore: First she hungered for Silver blood. Then
she hungered for power within. Last she hungered
for knowledge without. Until the Corsair
finally hungered for her.

mmlore: Now as the Void drew ever closer
and the eyes gained presence nigh,
<dark_gray>My mind escaping realms uncharted
<dark_gray>There is nothing left to hide.
Unbound Eternal Boots.name: Unbound Eternal Boots

mmlore: They have only walked the path
of eternal greed.
Varcosa's Cavaliers.name: Varcosa's Cavaliers

mmlore: The cool shade of the Fen veiled
great power. As the Silver shadow
waxed and waned over the Ring, the
Coven forever remained.
Veiled Might-2.name: Veiled Might

and are strangely soft...

mmlore: The thrashing of the tide brings
great uncertainty, as deep within,
a withering grimace lays, undisturbed.
Wavering Omen.name: Wavering Omen

mmlore: The power of ancient winds hum
within these sandals.
Zephyric Sandals.name: Zephyric Sandals

mmlore: The protection of an apron is usually
superficial when working with magic.
This one however...
Alchemical Apron.name: Alchemical Apron

mmlore: <dark_gray>The Emperor was too important to the
<dark_gray>Machine to lose. His new form was outfitted
<dark_gray>with highly protective armors that should
<dark_gray>protect from any unwanted accidents.
Anti-Acid Apron-2.name: Anti-Acid Apron

<dark_gray>themselves useful in more delicious ways.

stained with the blood of those
with whom we disagree.

horse and his rider.

mmlore: When you've been all over the
Celsian Isles, you need to be
prepared for anything.

witness his crimes.

hanging out?

ritual lives on.

corpse, infused by the cult presiding
over their bones.

mmlore: <dark_gray>If you intend to make the long trek across
<dark_gray>the Chillwind continent, you'll need to bundle
<dark_gray>up in the warmest Linxi fur available.
Chillwind Overcoat.name: Chillwind Overcoat

mmlore: A cobalt blue shift.
Cobaltean Cape.name: Cobaltean Cape

mmlore: From victory, silence.
Corrupted Monk's Robe.name: Corrupted Monk's Robe

mmlore: A cloak belonging to one of two scout corporals
sent to spy on the Southern Jaguar Village.
The tattered ribbons of fabric and flecks of
blood allude to an untimely demise.
Sergeant Sigrun will certainly want to know
about the fates of both men.
<light_purple>* Quest Item *
Davis's Cloak.name: Davis's Cloak

mmlore: Right click in hand or inventory to guarantee
the Earthbound tree as one of the
options at the beginning of the dungeon.
Requires purchase from trader to use.
Left click in hand to reset preference.

the Earthbound tree as one of the
options at the beginning of the dungeon.
Requires purchase from trader to use.

mmlore: We are small, but our legend
spreads like Ebola.
Ebola Shirt.name: Ebola Shirt

mmlore: The void creeps ever closer, shaping
what it cannot simply consume.
Failure of the Void.name: Failure of the Void

mmlore: I'm combat ready!
Fighter's Tunic.name: Fighter's Tunic

mmlore: The fertile soil of the Wolfswood owes gratitude
to the blood spilled upon it.
Final Harvest-1.name: Final Harvest

mmlore: The fertile soil of the Wolfswood owes gratitude
to the blood spilled upon it.
Final Harvest-2.name: Final Harvest

mmlore: The fertile soil of the Wolfswood owes gratitude

Final Harvest-4.name: Final Harvest

mmlore: A fiery passion sparks in your heart.
The fervor of battle shields mountain
storms and molten earth alike.
Flamekissed Tunic.name: Flamekissed Tunic

mmlore: A merciless ocean washed upon the burdened
cloth, its purpose in execution lost. But it is
beyond its craftsmanship now, left with a silence
no other could bear.
Garb of the Gallows-2.name: Garb of the Gallows

mmlore: A merciless ocean washed upon the burdened

mmlore: One cannot deny the elegance
of the bedsheet defense.
Ghost Costume.name: Ghost Costume

mmlore: Even the strongest warriors succumbed
to Myrahg's sickness.
Ghoulskin Shroud.name: Ghoulskin Shroud

mmlore: Bits of flesh cling to the leather in an unholy fusion.
Perhaps wash off before donning this garb.
Ghoulskin Vestment.name: Ghoulskin Vestment

mmlore: Embrace the might of the Jungle.
The Jungle shall provide. The
Jungle shall protect.
Jungle's Resilience.name: Jungle's Resilience

mmlore: I finished a Jumping Puzzle and
all I got was this lousy t-shirt.
Lousy T-Shirt.name: Lousy T-Shirt

mmlore: As their people bled, they
looked to the moon for answers,
and found only silence.
Lunatic's Robe.name: Lunatic's Robe

mmlore: <dark_gray>Crusty, matted fur has been shaped into a
<dark_gray>strangely resistant vestment. Many Norvigut
<dark_gray>must have been killed to stitch this together.
Matted Gorefur-2.name: Matted Gorefur

mmlore: <dark_gray>Crusty, matted fur has been shaped into a

mmlore: Strength through simplicity.
Monk's Robe.name: Monk's Robe

mmlore: While they refused to cut down any fungus,
the Mycelia had no such reservations about
other, less acquainted life.
Mycelian Mantra-0.name: Mycelian Mantra

mmlore: My nightingale sings me enchanting
songs. The ice crumbles, the earth quakes,
still she sings.
Night Rooster Cloak.name: Night Rooster Cloak

mmlore: Gleaming, colorful feathers line the wings.
Truly an artisan's masterpiece.
Parrot Plume Pinion.name: Parrot Plume Pinion

mmlore: Some memories become trapped in the fabric they died in.
Forgotten forever.
Petrified Runeplate.name: Petrified Runeplate

mmlore: When one passes, the tattoos fade
to the next, forever searching for
the vault deep within.
Phasing Chestplate.name: Phasing Chestplate

mmlore: You can live ten thousand lifetimes, but
you will never outlast eternity.
Phoenix Shroud.name: Phoenix Shroud

mmlore: None of them knew what brought the Plague.
All the Elders could think was that
Myrahg himself was ill.
Plaguebringer.name: Plaguebringer

mmlore: I am every thud of your fearful heart.
Reaper's Cloak.name: Reaper's Cloak

mmlore: Patterns in the cloth depict
three crowns in a regal gold
thread. Syl. Ka. Den.
Robes of the Pharaoh.name: Robes of the Pharaoh

mmlore: The roots beneath the Ring ran deep, ley lines of
pure mana that span throughout our world.
Connections that must have an epicenter, an origin...
Roots of Life-2.name: Roots of Life

<dark_gray>and claimed by pure evil.
Shroud of Dread.name: Shroud of Dread

mmlore: With every attack you feel it shift
and blow around your body - first
with a furious tempest, then a soft
spring breeze.

mmlore: <dark_gray>An alternate reality skin where the
<dark_gray>Failure of the Void was transformed
<dark_gray>into an aspect of Nihilo itself.

<dark_gray>Archmage's vestments are that of the
<dark_gray>blaze archmage in Arcane Rivalry.

mmlore: Shura looked onward at Ta'Ferna, once
the pride of the Tlaxani. She prayed for
Kaul's protection.
Soulbinder's Cuirass.name: Soulbinder's Cuirass

mmlore: The fungal infection burrowed into
every part of the village. From the
clothing to the minds of its inhabitants,
all were tainted by what the Mycelia had done.

<dark_gray>his body. The wind was cold and biting. It
<dark_gray>whistled and whispered as it bit into his skin.
<dark_gray>He should be invisible, yet he still felt something
<dark_gray>watching closely... He was next...

<dark_gray>effigies of their gods, the gods responded with
<dark_gray>blessings for the most faithful.
Swollen Scales.name: Swollen Scales

mmlore: When the last of the Blackflame died, some
found peace tending the bones.
The Decaying God.name: The Decaying God

mmlore: I now meet their gaze in the Veil.
<dark_gray>I now join that fraying tapestry.
No longer can I leave this ethereal realm.
Unbound Eternal Shroud.name: Unbound Eternal Shroud

mmlore: Covered in medals and
insignias of victory.
Uniform of the Arena Champion.name: Uniform of the Arena Champion

mmlore: The vest that once adorned the infamous
scourge of the sea.
Varcosa's Doublet.name: Varcosa's Doublet

mmlore: What lies beyond this world must never be
disturbed. This seal shall be a lock on
the door that separates reality.
Veilguard.name: Veilguard

mmlore: "When our Lady's chains fall, it will begin a new age.
One not of hidden strength, or endless seclusion,
but one of a bloody tide, overtaking all that is silver."
Verdant Dawn-2.name: Verdant Dawn

so she did her best to adapt.

3-D Glasses.name: 3-D Glasses

cloth shrouded a brilliant mind.
Argone Hood.name: Argone Hood

mmlore: As twilight fell upon Al Malakut,
the Vizier waited. He would be the
next bearer, should the ritual succeed.
Bearer's Headdress.name: Bearer's Headdress

mmlore: What is it with Wizards and
their giant hats?

their identities, but as a symbol. Their
personal whims were irrelevant. In becoming
faceless, they took on the burden of
the world.
Blackblade Mask-2.name: Blackblade Mask

Fire at will!
Protect the ship like your life depends on it!
Cannoneer's Cap.name: Cannoneer's Cap

mmlore: Wait, did we forget an 'e'?
Cap of Fear.name: Cap of Fear

mmlore: "These ancient woods have been defiled.
In the name of the Great Wolf, and in
the name of the All-Mother, we shall
restore the natural order!"
Cowl of the Coven-1.name: Cowl of the Coven

In the name of the Great Wolf, and in

mmlore: Even atop the mountain's peak,
none can be seen beyond the endless
sea of permafrost.
Crest of the Tundra.name: Crest of the Tundra

mmlore: Soft to the touch, yet you feel
a strong presence in this helm.
Crown of the Forbidden Yew.name: Crown of the Forbidden Yew

mmlore: <dark_gray>I am a key when you have discovered my color.
<dark_gray>Then bring me to the Knight...
Cryptic Breaker.name: Cryptic Breaker

mmlore: With the tide comes the Admiral, the
bearer of the glorious end.
Dread Admiral's Hat.name: Dread Admiral's Hat

mmlore: The waves do not remember, but the beasts
below will never forget.
Elder Scales.name: Elder Scales

mmlore: He was born a ruler. From his first
cry to his last gasp, the Emperor held
power firmly in his fist.
Emperor's Hood.name: Emperor's Hood

mmlore: Time after time the Silvari struck
against the Fen. Time after time
they were repelled.
Eternal Resolve-1.name: Eternal Resolve

against the Fen. Time after time

Explorer's Hat.name: Explorer's Hat

mmlore: The fabric is fragile and tears at the touch,
but longs to remember a day when it was strong,
and so it reforms anew.
Fading Echo.name: Fading Echo

mmlore: The Bastille pierced the Wolfswood's tranquility
like a dagger through the heart. The Great Wolf fell,
and a lifeless night took of all who lived under him.
Falling Blades-2.name: Falling Blades

mmlore: The Bastille pierced the Wolfswood's tranquility
like a dagger through the heart. The Great Wolf fell,
and a lifeless night took of all who lived under him.

mmlore: Nice guys finish last... M'lady
Fedora.name: Fedora

mmlore: Nothing will be wrong.
Grasses.name: Grasses

mmlore: Every age, it seems, is tainted by
the greed of men.
Helmet of Greed.name: Helmet of Greed

mmlore: <dark_gray>As the final seal broke, the Book's maw
<dark_gray>opened wide. The whisper grew. You feel a
<dark_gray>power overwhelming you, calling you to place
<dark_gray>it on your head, so it may feast and you may learn.
Incredibly Harmful Tome.name: Incredibly Harmful Tome

mmlore: It offers protection from the rains
of Spring and the rays of Summer.
In that space between you must sow
the seeds of Harmony.
Invigorating Paddy Hat.name: Invigorating Paddy Hat

mmlore: Let all strikes miss, for this
crown guards your fate.
Kismet's Blessing.name: Kismet's Blessing

mmlore: Belonged to a bright young pirate, whose
spirit has since been crushed.
Levyn's Pirate Hat.name: Levyn's Pirate Hat

mmlore: You feel the wind turn.
A chill hangs on the breeze.
It is time to reap the fruits of Harmony.
Mask of the Harvest.name: Mask of the Harvest

mmlore: Is it to stop the miasma, or to hide
the festering flesh beneath?
Mask of the Sealed.name: Mask of the Sealed

mmlore: Screams echoed throughout Nightroost -
they seemingly came from the sky itself.
Night Rooster Hood.name: Night Rooster Hood

mmlore: As long as Cazol held Kaul bound, the
Loci could never find the Sons. His fury
would be theirs to control.
Nightleaf Visage.name: Nightleaf Visage

mmlore: A prisoner to one's knowledge is
a fate worse than death.
Obsidian Skin.name: Obsidian Skin

mmlore: Ancient horns adorn your visage.
Ancient jaws command your voice.
Osseous Mask.name: Osseous Mask

mmlore: Rivers of fire beget rivers of blood -
to bear witness to these cursed visions
must drive the sane to madness.
Phlegethon Visage.name: Phlegethon Visage

mmlore: I am the darkness behind your eyes.
Reaper's Hood.name: Reaper's Hood

mmlore: A cap belonging to one of two scout corporals
sent to spy on the Southern Jaguar Village.
The tattered ribbons of fabric and flecks of
blood allude to an untimely demise.
Sergeant Sigrun will certainly want to know
about the fates of both men.
<light_purple>* Quest Item *
Redmond's Cap.name: Redmond's Cap

mmlore: Plagued first by Silver, then Silvari,
and now the Dichen threat. When surrounded
by such pests, one has no choice but
bloodshed.
Resilient Growth-1.name: Resilient Growth

and now the Dichen threat. When surrounded
by such pests, one has no choice but
bloodshed.

mmlore: Lets hope you don't end up
like this poor fellow.
Sacrifice's Scalp.name: Sacrifice's Scalp

mmlore: Woven from the echoes of betrayal, this
hood reliably protects the wearer from
blood, absorbing it and purifying it
into its original form - mana.
Sanguine Hood-2.name: Sanguine Hood

mmlore: Woven from the echoes of betrayal, this
hood reliably protects the wearer from

mmlore: There were few things that could bring
the rival Kingdoms of Ishnir and Chillwind
together, but the goal of the Congress
was enough.
Scholar's Hood.name: Scholar's Hood

mmlore: The material of the helmet is completely
waterlogged, fading away the words
Ka'Aqu stamped within.
Seasoaked Helmet.name: Seasoaked Helmet

mmlore: A pair of silver goggles, they
gleam in the light.
Silvered Sight.name: Silvered Sight

mmlore: Silver remembers the past more than any other metal.
The spiders know this better than most.
Silversilk Visage.name: Silversilk Visage

mmlore: Here too, whispers from Above have shown
themselves. Be it by stars or by moon,
the sky must still shatter.
Stargazer's Wrap.name: Stargazer's Wrap

mmlore: Those who built these halls watch over you.
Let their souls guide your careful eyes...
Stonegazer Eyes.name: Stonegazer Eyes

mmlore: Svalgot's eyes seek beyond what
can be seen naturally. The Void
guides his sight now.
Svalgot's Leer.name: Svalgot's Leer

mmlore: Begrudgingly, they made a pact.
Only death could separate them now.
Timeless Bond.name: Timeless Bond

mmlore: The wind blows with purpose over the docks
of Port Manteau. The echoes of ruin are
muted by the bustle of trade.
Tradewind Cap-1.name: Tradewind Cap

mmlore: The wind blows with purpose over the docks
of Port Manteau. The echoes of ruin are
muted by the bustle of trade.
Tradewind Cap-2.name: Tradewind Cap

mmlore: The vines hang somber over Ta'Ferna,
lamenting a loss felt by all.
Visage of the Lost.name: Visage of the Lost

mmlore: Brisk and Lively.
Vivac.name: Vivac

mmlore: Prep the deck and raise the sails
A new day rises, adventure hails.
Waverider's Cap.name: Waverider's Cap

mmlore: Belonged to a bright young pirate
who has been crushed.
Xeno's Pirate Hat.name: Xeno's Pirate Hat

mmlore: It was only when the people of
the empire, whom he had so
greatly loved, were endangered,
that Almon finally began to act.
He quarreled with Pelias for years,
but nothing came of it. Until that final day.
<bold><yellow>Taking this item outside of the dungeon
<bold><yellow>will instead drop it in the dungeon.
Almon's Severed Leg.name: Almon's Severed Leg

mmlore: Harden thy form, and slow thy movement.
Only then shall you become one with
the tortoise.
Ammi's Embrace.name: Ammi's Embrace

mmlore: Flecks of blood stain these ancient
sacrificial robes.
Ancient Robes.name: Ancient Robes

mmlore: The water flowing through these greaves
is reminiscent of the ancient aqueducts
within the city.
Aqueduct Greaves.name: Aqueduct Greaves

mmlore: When one's enemy is the Council,
one learns to be discreet.
Aradian Secrecy-1.name: Aradian Secrecy

mmlore: When one's enemy is the Council,
one learns to be discreet.
Aradian Secrecy-2.name: Aradian Secrecy

mmlore: Very heat-resistant, but best not
to wear them for too long.
Asbestos Pants.name: Asbestos Pants

mmlore: On appearance, they seem weak and unprotective,
but reality is not always what it seems at first glance.
Axtan Greaves.name: Axtan Greaves

mmlore: <#ffffaa>Arena of Terth
Basic Leather Pants.name: Basic Leather Pants

mmlore: To skin a creeper... what power
do these beastmen hold?
Boomwoven Vines.name: Boomwoven Vines

mmlore: A cold wind blows out of the cavern's
arcane pools. From the Monastery, a careful
eye watches the breeze.
Boreas Greaves.name: Boreas Greaves

mmlore: Caution: Highly Combustible!
Busty's Hot Pants.name: Busty's Hot Pants

mmlore: We are not trapped here with those Argone scum.
Rather, they are trapped in here with us.
Cloak of the Bastion.name: Cloak of the Bastion

mmlore: Scalding steam rises from these robes,
a reminder of what is to come.
Corrupted Water Robe.name: Corrupted Water Robe

mmlore: Found on the bottom floor.
Deepveil Shadows.name: Deepveil Shadows

mmlore: The Crimson King traveled far after his birth.
What he found in the world proved his cause.
Desert Explorer.name: Desert Explorer

mmlore: A simple garment, attuned with the
strength of the Jungle itself.
Earthbound Pants.name: Earthbound Pants

mmlore: His first grasp of real power was
at a young age. Secrets, held by a
strange being from a distant land.
He took them for himself.
Emperor's Robes (chest).name: Emperor's Robes

mmlore: There were others from those shores.
He thought them invaders. They cared
not for Isharist. They only wanted to
recapture what was theirs.
Emperor's Robes (legs).name: Emperor's Robes

mmlore: At the end, Eomen stood with his arms
wide, ready to embrace the magic sweeping
through the Forum. This was new ground
to break.
Eomen's Robes.name: Eomen's Robes

mmlore: The ripples in the cloth flow endlessly.
You feel yourself sinking into an infinite fervor.
Fervorous Robes.name: Fervorous Robes

mmlore: Forged with the sweetest Gems.
Gem Encrusted Manpance.name: Gem Encrusted Manpance

mmlore: Although fashioned from local wolves,
the pelt bears a distinctly foreign style.
Wearing it, you feel unstoppable.
Greymane Pelt.name: Greymane Pelt

mmlore: As Kaul's power consumed Hellshire,
he found himself reborn within
flames eternal.
Hellshire's Legguards.name: Hellshire's Legguards

mmlore: Those whipping winds of winter shall extinguish all.
Only a warrior's will persists in the blizzard.
Hiemal Robes.name: Hiemal Robes

mmlore: The hunting call of Ixume still
strikes fear into the heart of
Tlaxans. Channel it.
Ixume's Hunt.name: Ixume's Hunt

strikes fear into the heart of
Tlaxans. Channel it.
Ixume's Hunt-1.name: Ixume's Hunt

mmlore: The most fortunate of those who
seek the Fire Eagle are those
who do not find her.
Jeans of the Fire Eagle.name: Jeans of the Fire Eagle

mmlore: The Mycelia devised toxins that even
they could not withstand. Additional
shielding was required.
Laboratory Apron-0.name: Laboratory Apron

were even more embroiled with
Zealotry than the Amanita, willing
to sacrifice anything for their God.

were even more embroiled with

crafted from the hide of a rare beast.
Few are left to wander the mountains
the Elders reside within.
Marmothhide Leggings.name: Marmothhide Leggings

mmlore: The haunting screams of the Lunatics
fell on deaf ears. C'Zanil had only
one goal, and these beasts would
not stop him.
Mooncaller's Agony.name: Mooncaller's Agony

mmlore: Despite the damage suffered
in the Mycelian conflict, they
would again sustain. Rebuild.
Grow, once more.
Mycelic Skin-2.name: Mycelic Skin

in the Mycelian conflict, they
would again sustain. Rebuild.
Grow, once more.

mmlore: What's the number one skill a
rebel can have? Stealth, of course.
Night Rooster Leggings.name: Night Rooster Leggings

mmlore: <dark_gray>Something came before this place. A land so rich
<dark_gray>with magic that it became more. Until it was taken
<dark_gray>to restore balance to the cause.
Protomartyr Remains-1.name: Protomartyr Remains

mmlore: <dark_gray>The Dichen inherited the art of leaf weaving
from the quiet coast-dwellers who once occupied
the lands of Port Manteau. The Silvari colonists
twisted the ancient practice into a tool for war.
Razorleaf Breeches-2.name: Razorleaf Breeches

mmlore: The chill that makes blood run cold.
Reaper's Robes.name: Reaper's Robes

mmlore: While the Vesuvian magma stopped
flowing, the memory of it will
live on forever.
Robes of the Core.name: Robes of the Core

mmlore: Legend speaks of a blinding light, flashing in
the skies above the Blackroot. Only when The
Jungle chooses, does sunshine bless its leaves.
Robes of the Secret Sun.name: Robes of the Secret Sun

mmlore: I can't help but feel these should be light
blue... it's written in fate.
Runeweave Leggings.name: Runeweave Leggings

mmlore: Mauta's blessing be upon the rolling dunes
of Ishnir. From the mesa above to the canyons
below, the warmth of the Goddess is felt
by all her creatures.
Sands of Ishnir.name: Sands of Ishnir

mmlore: Armed with the study of the branch from
a fabled tree, they began to work on what
would be their greatest folly.
Scholar's Robes (chest).name: Scholar's Robes

mmlore: Their plans were progressing rapidly
and success was near. Surely nothing
could stop them now.
Scholar's Robes (legs).name: Scholar's Robes

mmlore: Yarr, ye got yer sea legs now!
Sea Legs.name: Sea Legs

mmlore: The lost souls swirling in these waters
are familiar. They too were tempted
by those beyond the Veil.
Seeker's Pursuit.name: Seeker's Pursuit

mmlore: We will remember them,
we who are left.
Serpensia Wrap.name: Serpensia Wrap

mmlore: There were no funerals for the lost
Silvari, for there were no bodies to
entomb. The shades were all that remained
of that doomed people.
Shroud of the Disappeared-1.name: Shroud of the Disappeared

corrupting the very land she stood upon.

mmlore: On the day the Temple was sealed,
dozens of Tlaxans entered to fight back
the corrupted. None emerged before
the doors closed.
Soulmire Walkers.name: Soulmire Walkers

large fungi. It seems to puff up, showing
sharp spines, when touched. The Mycelia's
isolationism, mimicked in their warrior garb.

a long, fulfilling life.
Starshine Pants.name: Starshine Pants

mmlore: Akin to a raging current, twisting back
and forth. This grim transfer of power
remains ageless, like the primordial ocean,
and the sweet release of death.
Striking Torrent-2.name: Striking Torrent

the world was torn into Void.
Sulfuric Robes.name: Sulfuric Robes

mmlore: On rare occasions, a hollow scream
rings through the trees. With it comes
scraps of fire and a monstrosity fueled
only by pain.
Sulfuric Threads.name: Sulfuric Threads

mmlore: Gone now from the Tlaxan people,
Kaul rested for the first time in centuries truly alone.
Threads of the Thicket.name: Threads of the Thicket

mmlore: The pants are thin and water
resistant, made to support a
fisherman's lifestyle.
Tidewalker Rags.name: Tidewalker Rags

mmlore: For King and Country.
Umbral Robe.name: Umbral Robe

mmlore: I am not trapped here with those in the Void.
Rather, I am now one with their forces.
Unbound Eternal Leggings.name: Unbound Eternal Leggings

mmlore: Strands of dark mist cling to these, like
a last breath, still held within.
Varcosa's Breeches.name: Varcosa's Breeches

mmlore: When one seeks an absence of power
they may instead find where it all
has gone. Beyond that is a hatred I
have never known before...
Vehemence.name: Vehemence

mmlore: <dark_gray>"O exalted heart of filth, hear me now and
<dark_gray>beat with the blood of the most willing, desperate
<dark_gray>only to give of their flesh and bone to thy cause."
Vilepriest Garments-1.name: Vilepriest Garments

you a boon worthy of the jungle.

that the Veil is never persistent and the
truth can always be changed.
Wavering Robes.name: Wavering Robes

lunacy overtook the temple.

words of power into the very aether
with their wands. The stones below would
hold the enemy. Their Bastion would be
lost in time. In time, the Scholars would be free.

<gray>for all items with the enchantment.

granting its user a longer life.

mmlore: Sometimes Luther questioned what Kokytos
truly wanted him to do. Sometimes it would
say something strange. It would mention the
Stars instead of the Lord on High. It saw
his people as mere servants to its cause.
What were the other beings it mentioned?
What did they do to the Lord on High?
Perhaps it would be safer if Kokytos couldn't
leave his chamber...
Cracked Mirrorshard.name: Cracked Mirrorshard

Among their woven pattern you glimpse
a hole in reality itself.
<gray>Right Button in inventory to store blocks
<gray>within the loom.

<gray><key:key.sneak> + <key:key.swapOffhand> in mainhand to cycle backwards.

and his body wracked with pain from the
understanding. He knew the threat he faced.

mmlore: Grants access to dungeon:
<#8b0000>Ephemeral Corridors
In <#8b0000>Endless Mode</#8b0000> there is a time limit. Up
to 3 players can enter the dungeon instance.
Upon death or running out of time, you are
ejected from the dungeon (<#d02e28>Keep Inventory</#d02e28>)
and granted rewards based on your treasure
score within the dungeon. After completion
of Floor Three, at the start of each floor
randomized delve modifiers are added to
your instance.
<#47b6b5>1 Player:</#47b6b5> 30 Minutes per Floor
<#47b6b5>2 Players:</#47b6b5> 17 Minutes per Floor
<#47b6b5>3 Players:</#47b6b5> 12 Minutes per Floor
Ephemeral Key - Endless.name: Ephemeral Key - Endless

mmlore: Grants access to dungeon:
<#8b0000>Ephemeral Corridors
In <#8b0000>Fullwipe Mode</#8b0000> there is a time limit. Up
to 3 players can enter the dungeon instance.
Upon death or running out of time, you are
ejected from the dungeon (<#8b0000>WITHOUT DROPPED GEAR</#8b0000>)
and granted rewards based on your treasure
score within the dungeon.
<#8b0000>WARNING: THIS MODE IS IDENTICAL TO STANDARD,
<#8b0000>BUT DEATH CAUSES YOU TO DROP ALL GEAR WITHOUT
<#8b0000>CREATING A GRAVE. DO NOT PICK THIS EXCEPT TO
<#8b0000>FLEX ON CASUALS.
<#47b6b5>1 Player:</#47b6b5> 30 Minutes per Floor
<#47b6b5>2 Players:</#47b6b5> 17 Minutes per Floor
<#47b6b5>3 Players:</#47b6b5> 12 Minutes per Floor
Ephemeral Key - Fullwipe.name: Ephemeral Key - Fullwipe

mmlore: Grants access to dungeon:
<#8b0000>Ephemeral Corridors
In <#ff6f55>Practice Mode</#ff6f55> there is no time limit. Up
to 3 players can enter the dungeon instance.
Upon death you will respawn back in the
main room of the dungeon. You may leave
at any time, however you can not re-enter
the same instance after leaving.
Rewards are only granted upon completion.
Ephemeral Key - Practice.name: Ephemeral Key - Practice

mmlore: Grants access to dungeon:

<#47b6b5>1 Player:</#47b6b5> 30 Minutes per Floor
<#47b6b5>2 Players:</#47b6b5> 17 Minutes per Floor

Ephemeral Key - Standard.name: Ephemeral Key - Standard

more subtly, left to simply be forgotten.

on top of the forsaken vault certainly helped.

even clearer than the remembered.

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Rich elites of Chillwind, let this be a warning to you.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>No longer will you walk all over us.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>You sit there in comfort, surrounded by your
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>vast fortunes stolen from hard-working citizens.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>And us? We're ignored, left to live in squalor.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>We refuse to abide by this any longer.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>The rooster crows at midnight.

so too did the magic left in blood.
And soon would the nightmares of others
still haunted by strange darkness rage
as well. Do they know they are connected?
Every waning moment draws them closer
to the truth in the darkness of dreams.

mmlore: Jump, run, crawl, hide, cower. All that you
can, all that you are, is incapable of
outpacing the nightmare. Delaying the
hands of fate will only further its grip
on the interwoven threads of reality. Ever
present, the dream spirals on, even when
you wish it most to cease.

who stand in our way, will not watch at all.

mmlore: <dark_gray>Daarken plucked the wool from the limp corpse
<dark_gray>of the former Emperor, whose crimes had
<dark_gray>at last been paid for - the razing of his
<dark_gray>mighty empire. Once Crimson's pair was
<dark_gray>found, Daarken would leave this mess to the
<dark_gray>Giants. For now, a new resting place would
<dark_gray>be necessary. The Monument must be reformed
<dark_gray>in that primordial jungle of spirits...
<dark_gray>Perhaps he would rest there too...
Replica Crimson Wool.name: Replica Crimson Wool

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>As Salazar's imbalance rippled through
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>the wool, he saw a vision of a world
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>far separated from his own. A fragment
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>of Void long since frayed from the Veil.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>A realm of pure dissonance.
Replica Lilac Wool.name: Replica Lilac Wool

mmlore: Vaessini and Orasomn. Crimson and Teal.
Tied together through more than time and
memories. Without Vaessini's surrender,
the Architect could never have overseen
Orasomn's capture. Without Orasomn's
freedom, Vaessini could never have found
his Home again. Now one will hold the other
in eternal vigil.
Replica Malefactor and Manumitted.name: Replica Malefactor and Manumitted

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>It seeks a cageless world to roam
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>For silver does malign.
Replica Olive Wool.name: Replica Olive Wool

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>As his spawn made contact with the
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>wool, he saw visions of the world across
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>the newly formed rift. Ymmodae had
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>finally found a potential way in.
Replica Rose Wool.name: Replica Rose Wool

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>And with that, our hero learned a very valuable
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>lesson. Don't accept drinks from strangers
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>and hallucinate about a Wool that never existed.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>(But if it did exist, its aspect would totally be Festivity.)
Replica Snow Wool.name: Replica Snow Wool

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Forward now, thy fate shall write;
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>A tomb now binds that wayward knight.
Replica Teal Wool.name: Replica Teal Wool

He could breathe their air.
He could destroy their greatest treasure.

mmlore: Iota scoured her data banks, seeking
the source of the corruption that
had taken her mind and freedom from
her. It seemed to have left no trace,
until she noticed a small, seemingly
negligable blip of energy within her.
It whispered in an inaudible tone, the
words incomprehensible. But... it was
almost as if she could make out the
repeated use of "Neo"...

seem to escape the bag when uncinched.
It may be best to keep the bag closed.

mmlore: The Ishnir elite's favorite gold
colored fizzy drink for a hot day.
Strong Potion of Protection.name: Strong Potion of Protection

mmlore: A choice philter for many
of Chillwind's Mage Hunters.
Strong Restorative Shield.name: Strong Restorative Shield

mmlore: Okay, this might be going too Farr...

mmlore: Dropped from a wilted flower on a
blackened branch, this fruit is threatening
to burst with the slightest pressure.
Unstable Willowfruit.name: Unstable Willowfruit

mmlore: A few golden doubloons are left in the
otherwise empty sack. Simply reaching
within fills your mind with a desire for more.

mmlore: The very skin of the bag is alive with
a corrupting alchemy. Your materials within
are infused with a twisting power from Below.

mmlore: An unbroken vial scavenged from the Sons
of the Forest, meant to shatter upon their
death. A noxious mixture trembles within.
Warden's Satchel.name: Warden's Satchel

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Have a splash!
Water Balloon.name: Water Balloon

mmlore: The safest pet in existence.
Also very RED.
Plain Cabbage.name: Plain Cabbage

mmlore: The war has erupted and the leaves are
stained with blood. Kaul has expressed his fury.
He has yet to notice my spell, tugging at his
power to grant strength to the Tlaxan army.
<bold><yellow>Taking this item outside of the dungeon
<bold><yellow>will instead drop it in the dungeon.
Corrupted Key 2.name: Corrupted Key 2

Hops harvested in ages long past.

Wand of the Mire.name: Wand of the Mire

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>This spyglass once belonged
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>to the late Captain Bijou.

mmlore: Steam radiates from the

mmlore: The spells you cast with the wand
seem to smell of sulfur and chemicals.

<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>But the static Doorways are perhaps

<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Places nobody was meant to find.

<gray><key:key.use/> in main hand or inventory

A doorway cracks open...
<light_purple>* Quest Item *

of nature. There is always more.
Elemental Wrath.name: Elemental Wrath

a pain stretching across the whole of
the Blackroot. This wood has been stripped
from Kaul's own heart.

mmlore: A tool to reshape our own worlds.
Instrument of Weavers.name: Instrument of Weavers

mmlore: Fresh cursestone rests affixed to the stave.
A miner's labor earned it, and a miner's
madness wields it.
Malebolge Stave.name: Malebolge Stave

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *

<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Doorways into the Veil are not
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>always static. While some exist, hidden
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>from mortal gaze, most who enter
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>go there by accident... and return changed.

would find it more befitting.
North Pole.name: North Pole

plundered by fools.
Paintbrush.name: Paintbrush

mmlore: Time seems to twist around the very
magic this wand produces.
Riftbolt Stave.name: Riftbolt Stave

A scepter that is supposedly capable of binding
an ensemble to its conductor, enabling them to
play together in perfect harmony. Unfortunately,
without an ensemble, it is an ordinary stick.

used to keep the Bastion at bay.
Siershen's Caster.name: Siershen's Caster

unto them destruction!"
Staff of the Soulseeker.name: Staff of the Soulseeker

May the jungle aid your sight and be
your guide.

The Stick of Ultimate Destiny!.name: The Stick of Ultimate Destiny!

power of lightning.
Thunderstorm Staff.name: Thunderstorm Staff

<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Time bends, beings shift, and life

<light_purple>* Quest Item *

The ripples of reality themselves bend
to your will for a brief moment, then...
Silence.

Wand of Whispers.name: Wand of Whispers

true Staff he would never reach.

of this eerie place. The sacrament is
hidden within the growth...

Witchy Wand.name: Witchy Wand

<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>By time and by design
Wooden Needle.name: Wooden Needle

mmlore: Magic penetrated the very air of
the fortress as the powers of Life
and Reality met for the first time
in thousands of years.

the fortress as the powers of Life

beneath the tundra however.

a mage's magic eventually seeps into their bones.

halls. There is no power in this
curse-ridden city.
Bonecarver.name: Bonecarver

mmlore: The sea boils. Soon you shall too.

Dreadful Crusher.name: Dreadful Crusher

mmlore: Behind the veil, there
is only darkness.
Erebus.name: Erebus

mmlore: Passed on through millennia, the ancient
hammer still evokes the might of
the Silver Knights.
Hammer of Legacy-0.name: Hammer of Legacy

mmlore: Passed on through millennia, the ancient
hammer still evokes the might of
the Silver Knights.
Hammer of Legacy-1.name: Hammer of Legacy

Hammer of Legacy-4.name: Hammer of Legacy

mmlore: The wrath of the elements behind
its every strike.
Hurricane Halberd.name: Hurricane Halberd

Ekah's realm, they gazed outwards at
the majesty of the jungle, which has
long since abandoned them.
Jaguartooth Cleaver.name: Jaguartooth Cleaver

eye. The only respite for the Lunatics comes
from beyond this world.
Lunatic's Respite.name: Lunatic's Respite

of dissonance, only wielded by those who could
sate its endless appetite. A velvet haze shrouded
the gateway, accompanied by a frenzied, tarnished
legion. Only an ageless existence awaited them.
Nothing more, nothing less.
Ravenous Haze.name: Ravenous Haze

mmlore: Just needs a Frodian touch...
Saving Grace.name: Saving Grace

mmlore: "Why the obssession with 'argh'? What's
wrong with the other letters?"
Scalawag's Hatchet.name: Scalawag's Hatchet

mmlore: A mighty weapon of heroes past.
Silver Knight's Hammer.name: Silver Knight's Hammer

mmlore: With the Argone still sealed away, a Tlaxan
scout instead ventured West. The voice of
a new God echoed from the ocean sky, causing
the weapon to be consumed by another blight.
Sketched Threadwarped Tkaa.name: Sketched Threadwarped Tkaa

mmlore: No light escapes the pitch black stone.
Each swing tears the world around you.
Slipstrike.name: Slipstrike

mmlore: Crush the body, crush the soul, crush
the life that makes them whole.
Soulcrusher.name: Soulcrusher

mmlore: Past their shadows, there lies only
eternity and fathomless beings, not
any semblance of truth.
Spectral Halberd.name: Spectral Halberd

mmlore: Fiery spirits swarm through the
halls. There is no peace in this
blood-soaked place.
Spiritspark Flint.name: Spiritspark Flint

mmlore: Fiery spirits swarm through the
halls. There is no peace in this
blood-soaked place.
Spiritspark Flint-1.name: Spiritspark Flint

mmlore: Fiery spirits swarm through the
halls. There is no peace in this
blood-soaked place.
Spiritspark Flint-2.name: Spiritspark Flint

blood-soaked place.
Spiritspark Flint-3.name: Spiritspark Flint

mmlore: Fiery spirits swarm through the
halls. There is no peace in this
blood-soaked place.
Spiritspark Flint-4.name: Spiritspark Flint

mmlore: There is nothing more fierce
than a Jaguar enraged.
The Ravager.name: The Ravager

mmlore: Something about this Tlaxan weapon
causes the hair on the back of your
neck to stand up. It is no longer
of this world.
Threadwarped Tkaa.name: Threadwarped Tkaa

mmlore: I clutched my Tkaa in my hands, prepared
to fight whatever emerged. For my people.
All I had done was for them. I could not
stop now. We were so close to freedom.
Tkaa of C'Axtal.name: Tkaa of C'Axtal

mmlore: Destroy the opposition. None must
survive. No matter what, this mockery
of Velara shall fall.
Velara Crusher.name: Velara Crusher

mmlore: Transmutation is in the soul of the alchemist.
To turn the tides of battle is but another
simple reaction.
Alchemist's Insight.name: Alchemist's Insight

mmlore: The heat of the Jungle is nothing compared
to the molten caverns below.
Cavewalker Scythe.name: Cavewalker Scythe

mmlore: The collective roots of the Mycelia
once showed solidarity, but with the
Godspore turned tyrant, they now
show only its insidious reach.
Crescent of Dominion-2.name: Crescent of Dominion

mmlore: The collective roots of the Mycelia
once showed solidarity, but with the
Godspore turned tyrant, they now
show only its insidious reach.
Crescent of Dominion-3.name: Crescent of Dominion

once showed solidarity, but with the
Godspore turned tyrant, they now
show only its insidious reach.
Crescent of Dominion-4.name: Crescent of Dominion

runs cold. Its hatred however...
That will never die.
Demon's Scar (stone_hoe).name: Demon's Scar

mmlore: With a sigh, a dream escapes the scythe,
showing a lone warlock leaning on a rock,
gazing out across the soft plains.
Divine Harvestman's Scythe.name: Divine Harvestman's Scythe

mmlore: Even when wielded by power not felt,
the accursed sickle still leaves
disaster in its wake.
Dreadful Harvester.name: Dreadful Harvester

mmlore: Alas poor Scythe, its owner got Pw4ned
Entropic Razor.name: Entropic Razor

mmlore: Vines crawl across the blade, some ancient
earthen magic rests within.
Forest's Reaper.name: Forest's Reaper

mmlore: Even beyond death, the bones
remember the chill.
Frostbite Scythe.name: Frostbite Scythe

mmlore: Cull the harvest. Block the screams. Lock
the doors and guard the dreams.
Harvestman's Scythe.name: Harvestman's Scythe

mmlore: Forging an actual weapon?
No no no, that's much too civilized.
Ice Sickle.name: Ice Sickle

mmlore: Simplistic, but effective.
Render's Ruthless Claw.name: Render's Ruthless Claw

mmlore: Made of a gleaming Red Rock.
Ruby Scythe.name: Ruby Scythe

mmlore: Red like roses, fills my dreams and brings
me to the place you rest...
Ruby's Rose.name: Ruby's Rose

mmlore: Remnants of trees, grass, and blood
stain this rusting blade. Its history
is worn upon its edge.
Sickle of the Maker.name: Sickle of the Maker

mmlore: What beasts could stalk the nightmares
of the jungle?
Sleepwalker's Sickle.name: Sleepwalker's Sickle

mmlore: Power teems through the shaft.
Arcane Pickaxe.name: Arcane Pickaxe

mmlore: Now with a seized means of production!
Comrade Kirkomotyga.name: Comrade Kirkomotyga

mmlore: <dark_gray>The anger of the mountain rages deep
<dark_gray>below, only erupting long after the insult
<dark_gray>has been forgotten.
Ekah's Anger.name: Ekah's Anger

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><yellow>Enchanted to destroy the
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><yellow>druids' summoning stone

mmlore: Let your life be more
than your labor.

the home of the Tlaxan Elders, hidden
in the depths of the Jaguartooth Mountains
well beyond the Valley.

mmlore: Not particularly useful in most situations.
<light_purple>* Quest Item *
Old Pickaxe.name: Old Pickaxe

mmlore: The arcane byproduct from a failed
transmutation of the undead.
Raindrop Spellbreaker.name: Raindrop Spellbreaker

again. And again. And again.
Rubblebane.name: Rubblebane

mmlore: The rich magic flowing from the Celsian
waters can find its way into some most
peculiar trinkets.
Salubrious Chisel.name: Salubrious Chisel

mmlore: These crumbling temples and flooded
halls, they look man-made, but what
people built them?
Stoneborn Sculptor.name: Stoneborn Sculptor

mmlore: These crumbling temples and flooded
halls, they look man-made, but what
people built them?
Stoneborn Sculptor-2.name: Stoneborn Sculptor

<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Better let Akema inspect it.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *

mmlore: When hatred pierces the heart of nature,
the earth itself rises to destroy.
Abomination Splinter.name: Abomination Splinter

mmlore: Near death a hazy rage did fall
and Alric breathed in gore.
With final strength the dagger fell.
The giant was no more.
Alric's Eyegouger.name: Alric's Eyegouger

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>It would be nice if it was polished...

mmlore: All swords have blades. This isn't
a sword, though. Ergo, this syllogism
is irrelevant.
Ari's Ionic Buster.name: Ari's Ionic Buster

mmlore: Stab down, and take their soul.
Ashheart Dagger.name: Ashheart Dagger

mmlore: Here we stand, among a mountain of lies
and secrets, in order to protect that which
must never be set free again.
Axtan Blade.name: Axtan Blade

mmlore: After war, vultures come to feast on
the broken land, whether they be winged,
or carrying knife and sword.
Bandit's Dagger.name: Bandit's Dagger

mmlore: Through the Black the Horseman rode.
In one hand, conquest.
The other, control.
Blackthread Whip.name: Blackthread Whip

mmlore: The hilt is warm to the touch. You feel
invigorated while holding it.
Blade de Vie.name: Blade de Vie

mmlore: The holy blade which only legends fabled.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *

mmlore: The wrath of the blizzard
dances within the blade.
Blizzard Blade.name: Blizzard Blade

mmlore: A broken blade, once held by a
traveler that has become Memory.
Broken Ancient Blade.name: Broken Ancient Blade

mmlore: From the Sea to the Maw, the brackish
Blackroot ebbs steady. Not swamp nor
Forest will alter the flow of its
life-giving waters.
Cascade.name: Cascade

mmlore: From the Sea to the Maw, the brackish
Blackroot ebbs steady. Not swamp nor
Forest will alter the flow of its
life-giving waters.
Cascade-2.name: Cascade

Cascade-4.name: Cascade

mmlore: You really hope the discoloration
is just a patina.
Chef's Knife.name: Chef's Knife

mmlore: You find this while rummaging
around in the dung. Yuck!
Civit Dagger.name: Civit Dagger

mmlore: <gray>Price: 5 stacks of Concentrated XP
Completely Normal Sword.name: Completely Normal Sword

mmlore: Nullae Omnino Praesidio Relictis.
Corrupted Watcher's Sword.name: Corrupted Watcher's Sword

mmlore: The sword emanates a familiar energy.
Cracked Blade de Vie.name: Cracked Blade de Vie

mmlore: Destroyed, perhaps beyond repair. It is
only a memory of its former self.
Destroyed Ancient Blade.name: Destroyed Ancient Blade

mmlore: What was once Memory can again be made real.
A Kingdom lost, a blade found.
Dissolvi Ombre.name: Dissolvi Ombre

mmlore: White petals bloom, whispering of
a maiden whose divinity was greater
than even this blade.
Divine Rosethorn Blade.name: Divine Rosethorn Blade

mmlore: The adventurers fought side by side for
an age. No matter who they faced, their
adversaries were always defeated.
Divine Watcher's Sword.name: Divine Watcher's Sword

mmlore: For honor! For glory! For
the Gem, Al Malakut!
Dutiful Blade.name: Dutiful Blade

mmlore: A relic of the Southern Jungle. Heavy,
but a symbol of strength.
Earthbound Runeblade.name: Earthbound Runeblade

mmlore: The specimens of this lab must be
quite the hassle...
Entomology Scalpel.name: Entomology Scalpel

mmlore: As the horizon disappeared beyond
a pitch-black sea, the echoing howls
of those lost at sea pierces through
the deafening silence.
Fading Horizon-2.name: Fading Horizon

mmlore: As the horizon disappeared beyond
a pitch-black sea, the echoing howls
of those lost at sea pierces through
the deafening silence.
Fading Horizon-3.name: Fading Horizon

mmlore: As the horizon disappeared beyond
a pitch-black sea, the echoing howls
of those lost at sea pierces through
the deafening silence.
Fading Horizon-4.name: Fading Horizon

mmlore: A relic of the Deep Swamp. The blade radiates
a strange warmth, and the words Ka'Fri
are engraved upon its hilt.
Flamekissed Runeblade.name: Flamekissed Runeblade

mmlore: Victory or Destruction? The ancient power
of randomness chooses no sides.
Frodian Keyblade.name: Frodian Keyblade

mmlore: All that remained was a way beyond.
A rift strong enough to allow passage.
A path to harmony.
Harmony's End.name: Harmony's End

mmlore: At the end of every holiday
season, next year's preparation
is most easily found out back.
Holiday's End.name: Holiday's End

mmlore: Once a blade of Pelias' Guard, now reduced
to a hollow memento. It feels light, yet
devoid of any real purpose.
Hollow Gladius-0.name: Hollow Gladius

mmlore: As Pelias drew further into madness,
his denouncement by the Silver Priests
became an arrow in the side of the empire.
Holy Vitriol-0.name: Holy Vitriol

his denouncement by the Silver Priests
became an arrow in the side of the empire.
Holy Vitriol-1.name: Holy Vitriol

<dark_gray>into the night sky has become the place where
<dark_gray>it shall instead be shattered.
Hungering Moonbeams-1.name: Hungering Moonbeams

mmlore: <dark_gray>Atop the tower, what once was a site to gaze
<dark_gray>into the night sky has become the place where
<dark_gray>it shall instead be shattered.

mmlore: What was once an eden can be lit aflame
once more. A world scorched, a blade found.
Infernal Katar.name: Infernal Katar

mmlore: The intricate crafting has been
severely worn by ages of decay
within the Veil. It would take someone
exceptionally knowledgeable in its
design in order to repair it.
Irrus' Brace.name: Irrus' Brace

mmlore: With the war came betrayal.
With betrayal came the fury.
Jungle's Vengeance.name: Jungle's Vengeance

mmlore: A shortsword belonging to Sergeant Kim, who was
sent to spy on the Northern Jaguar Village.
In its current condition, the blade is
no better than a blunt instrument.
Sergeant Sigrun will certainly want to know
about her fate.
<light_purple>* Quest Item *
Kim's Sword.name: Kim's Sword

mmlore: All the offerings in the world could
not placate Kaul's rage as he discovered
what C'Axtal had done.
Loci Offering.name: Loci Offering

mmlore: The crystalline structure of the blade reflects
all, whether it be the corpse of an enemy
or the eye of its wielder.
Lustrous Edge.name: Lustrous Edge

mmlore: Once enshrined in the Frostgate crypts,
the Frost Moon recovered the blade.
A new Prophet must be protected in the
same manner as the Old.
Moon's Judgment.name: Moon's Judgment

mmlore: Under the glow of the full moon the
Night's Messenger walks again.
Moon's Shadow.name: Moon's Shadow

mmlore: There will always be retaliation from
the Messenger of the Night.
Night's Shadow.name: Night's Shadow

mmlore: A flawless, jet-black blade that
hums with vibrant energy. Its hilt
is inscribed with the name "Noren".
Onyx Dagger.name: Onyx Dagger

mmlore: Blind faith eclipsed the pleas for a quiet life.
In the end, a bright star has faded far
beyond this realm, while another star
is preparing to light up the firmament.
Ophion.name: Ophion

mmlore: Time passes; the shadows loom.
Passing Shadows.name: Passing Shadows

mmlore: Vines grow rapidly along the blade,
creating power from nature.
Poison Ivy.name: Poison Ivy

mmlore: A colorful aura envelopes the blade,
distorting the light around it. What
else could this magic hide?
Prismatic Blade.name: Prismatic Blade

mmlore: A colorful aura envelopes the blade,
distorting the light around it. What
else could this magic hide?
Prismatic Blade-2.name: Prismatic Blade

mmlore: A colorful aura envelopes the blade,
distorting the light around it. What
else could this magic hide?
Prismatic Blade-3.name: Prismatic Blade

mmlore: A colorful aura envelopes the blade,
distorting the light around it. What
else could this magic hide?
Prismatic Blade-4.name: Prismatic Blade

mmlore: The claws of a jaguar.
The soul of the jungle.
Purified Claw.name: Purified Claw

mmlore: Everything will fade one day. But
don't worry friend - from nothing,
flowers will bloom again.
Rinascita.name: Rinascita

mmlore: Rocks, trees, wind on our cheeks! The
solid earth! The actual world!
Rootstrike.name: Rootstrike

mmlore: And within the corridors, the
true power is awoken.
Rosethorn Blade.name: Rosethorn Blade

mmlore: A standard-issue weapon used by some
foreign soldiers to help parry incoming
attacks. In some situations however, this
weapon can prove formidable in combat.
Rusted Soldier's Sai.name: Rusted Soldier's Sai

mmlore: The first to fall will be C'Shura.
The Tlaxans will follow.
Sacrificial Dagger.name: Sacrificial Dagger

mmlore: Imparted with the blessings of the
jungle by the elders within Ta'Ksaav.
Sanctified Dagger.name: Sanctified Dagger

mmlore: <dark_gray>Some found it easier to survive by grafting
<dark_gray>appendages from those they defeated onto
<dark_gray>themselves. Trophies? Weapons?
Scoundrel's Appendage-3.name: Scoundrel's Appendage

mmlore: <dark_gray>Some found it easier to survive by grafting
<dark_gray>appendages from those they defeated onto
<dark_gray>themselves. Trophies? Weapons?
Scoundrel's Appendage-4.name: Scoundrel's Appendage

mmlore: A relic of the Eastern Swamplands. The blade
shifts and ebbs, like the tides.
Seasoaked Runeblade.name: Seasoaked Runeblade

mmlore: <dark_gray>While Cascade brings to mind the flow
<dark_gray>of a river, what could it be if frozen?
<dark_gray>Perhaps we could call it "Frostbite"?
Sketched Cascade.name: Sketched Cascade

mmlore: Suddenly, a path was opened by the blade. From
a shimmering crack, the Tuathan stepped into
the shrine. Cherry blossoms dotted the garden.
The anguish of a million voices was now balanced
by the soft sound of peace.
Sketched Harmony's End.name: Sketched Harmony's End

mmlore: A relic of the Central Plateau. It
seems to spark in your palms.
Stormborn Runeblade.name: Stormborn Runeblade

mmlore: Time flows strangely in this place,
with each moment extended perpetually
into the future.
Telum Immoriel.name: Telum Immoriel

mmlore: Time flows strangely in this place,
with each moment extended perpetually
into the future.
Telum Immoriel-2.name: Telum Immoriel

mmlore: Time flows strangely in this place,
with each moment extended perpetually
into the future.
Telum Immoriel-3.name: Telum Immoriel

mmlore: Time flows strangely in this place,
with each moment extended perpetually

Telum Immoriel-4.name: Telum Immoriel

mmlore: "Yes, yes. Yes. This shall be yours
now. We will remember this gift and
expect one in kind."
Tuathan Construct.name: Tuathan Construct

mmlore: Though its branches were petrified
and devoid of the Nexus' mana,
the Tree burst forth from
its Silver prison all the same.
Vacant Dagger-1.name: Vacant Dagger

mmlore: Though its branches were petrified
and devoid of the Nexus' mana,
the Tree burst forth from
its Silver prison all the same.
Vacant Dagger-2.name: Vacant Dagger

Vacant Dagger-4.name: Vacant Dagger

mmlore: Quis Custodiet Ipsos Custodes?
Watcher's Sword.name: Watcher's Sword

mmlore: Nature strikes back as
the Beastmen howl.
Wildthrasher.name: Wildthrasher

mmlore: My compass spins,
the wilderness remains.
Wolfswood's Reach-1.name: Wolfswood's Reach

mmlore: My compass spins,
the wilderness remains.
Wolfswood's Reach-2.name: Wolfswood's Reach

mmlore: My compass spins,
the wilderness remains.
Wolfswood's Reach-3.name: Wolfswood's Reach

mmlore: My compass spins,

mmlore: An unusually large and heavy
greatsword normally wielded
with two hands. It looks worn.
Worn Claymore.name: Worn Claymore

mmlore: Though faint, some memories
cling on forever.
Yurei.name: Yurei

mmlore: Quis Custodeit Ipsos Custodets?
dlWatcher's Sword.name: dlWatcher's Sword

mmlore: An incident like with Teal could not be
allowed to occur again. Clearly, Calder
thought, there are things unknown to
the scribes of history. Secrets within
secrets that have been scrubbed
from the world's eye. The imprisoned
ones are more than proof of this.
But he must persist regardless, as
nothing can truly be indestructible.
Whatever method it may take to rid the
world of them, he will find it.
Blue-Colored Thread.name: Blue-Colored Thread

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Holding this fills you with
final memories before death.
Dreadful Memory Strand.name: Dreadful Memory Strand

mmlore: C'Axtal bore witness to the secret
Kaul had been hiding from his people,
a god that had gone unknown to them.
Enraged by the betrayal of his chosen
Soulspeaker, to whom he had bestowed
his blessings, Kaul woke. Ta'Ferna
would burn for this sin.
Golden Strand.name: Golden Strand

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Holding this fills you with
memories of new beginnings.
Inspired Memory Strand.name: Inspired Memory Strand

mmlore: It seems ready to slip into nothingness.
Olive Strand.name: Olive Strand

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>A small glimmer at the balance that once was...
Rose-Colored Thread.name: Rose-Colored Thread

mmlore: A small piece of
something greater.
Snow Wool Strand.name: Snow Wool Strand

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
#QAFI05
Cast into the Wind to speak to the Breeze...

String of Harmony.name: String of Harmony

mmlore: What secrets are you hiding?
Twisted Strand.name: Twisted Strand

nearly weightless.

<gray>like any other tier V item.
<gray>Can be put into a wallet.

mmlore: The most valuable coin from the
Viridian Empire.
100 Den Piece.name: 100 Den Piece

the Dawnbringer tree as one of the
options at the beginning of the dungeon.
Requires purchase from trader to use.
Left click in hand to reset preference.
Dawnbringer Talisman.name: Dawnbringer Talisman

the Dawnbringer tree as one of the

<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>A trophy given for winning the
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Monumenta Connect 4 Tournament.
