<gray><key:key.use/> while holding to decompress once.
<gray><key:key.use/> + <key:key.sneak/> while holding to decompress 10.
Hyperexperience.name: Hyperexperience

mmlore: As the stranger progressed through
the temple, reaching its inner most
depths, Varcosa's soul could feel the
shackles that had long binded him fall
away. Had it been done? Had someone
truly claimed The Corsair, tearing it
from the anchor that gave it dominion
here? The time had come for him to
leave. He must scour the Veil and find
his crew. They needed their captain.
Piece of Hate.name: Piece of Hate

mmlore: Currency from the long forgotten
empire of Viridia. Likely not worth much now.
Viridian Den.name: Viridian Den

mmlore: <!italic><dark_gray>Once, it was tossed into the
<!italic><dark_gray>depths for luck. Now, perhaps
<!italic><dark_gray>it can be used for something
<!italic><dark_gray>more...
Whirlpool Coin.name: Whirlpool Coin

mmlore: A stewed vegetable medley with some local
spices and fresh fish. Delightfully tasty
but difficult to transport once served.
Dichen Specialty Stew.name: Dichen Specialty Stew

mmlore: It whispers power not yet discovered...
Trembling Willow Strand.name: Trembling Willow Strand

mmlore: Wrapped around a protean stone,
it whispers power disturbed.
<light_purple>* Quest Item *
Warping Willow Strand.name: Warping Willow Strand

mmlore: <gray>Stores picked up arrows, and uses
<gray>stored arrows to shoot bows and crossbows.
Press <key:key.use/> while in your inventory to open.
Captain's Quiver.name: Captain's Quiver

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Could pierce through
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>reality itself.
Pale Arrow.name: Pale Arrow

mmlore: <gray>Stores picked up arrows, and uses
<gray>stored arrows to shoot bows and crossbows.
Press <key:key.use/> while in your inventory to open.
Scout's Quiver.name: Scout's Quiver

mmlore: <gray>Connected by Ekah to the source of
<gray>Ta'Eldim's hot springs, imbuing picked
<gray>up arrows with their properties.
Press <key:key.use/> while in your inventory to open.
Shaman's Quiver.name: Shaman's Quiver

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
Best TNT Ever (player head).name: Best TNT Ever

mmlore: This little light of mine, I'm
gonna let it shine...
Arcane Torch.name: Arcane Torch

mmlore: Fashioned in the visage of Myrahg,
twisted by those sealed within the Temple.
Idol of Immortality.name: Idol of Immortality

mmlore: Now I stand, the guardian of Kaul's rage.
No longer can I protect my people. I only
can protect the Jungle.
Ixchtek of C'Axtal.name: Ixchtek of C'Axtal

mmlore: From clay, you were forged.
From the ashes, you rise anew.
Necromancer's Sigil.name: Necromancer's Sigil

mmlore: A giant's knowledge, and a man named
Chris. With this, your pain relieved.
<gray>Consuming this item will allow the Perfect
<gray>Crystallizer to convert Uncommons into
<gray>regional and circus/carnival currencies.
<gray>Consumed by left clicking in mainhand.
<red>Consuming this item cannot be undone!
Perfect Christallizer.name: Perfect Christallizer

mmlore: A giant's knowledge, and a man named
Chris. With this, your pain relieved.
<gray>Consuming this item will allow the Perfect
<gray>Crystallizer to convert Uncommons into
<gray>regional and circus/carnival currencies.
Perfect Christallizer (Consumed).name: Perfect Christallizer (Consumed)

mmlore: In the era before the Pharaoh
we worshipped not a man,
but the manifestations
of the gods within ourselves.
Sacred Ankh.name: Sacred Ankh

mmlore: The forest is part of a greater whole,
it breathes... it sleeps...
Totem of the Forest.name: Totem of the Forest

mmlore: A trophy from the guardian of the Laboratory.
May your battles be unyielding.
Totem of the Unyielding.name: Totem of the Unyielding

mmlore: Ah... so that's how it feels!
Valkyrie Band.name: Valkyrie Band

mmlore: Intricate carvings mar the handle of the
enormous spear, claiming that a beast
feasts steadily beneath the waves.

Alric, Lord of the Chilled Winds and
first of the Stargazers.

demanding he free Myrahg from its bindings.
Those thoughts soon enough gave way to action...

<dark_red>Completion of Sporetal Combat and 3⭐

<dark_gray>would work deliciously. Her methods may
<dark_gray>be brutal, but none dared stop her.

But death without life reaped horrible rewards.
Soon, the one who remained would welcome the end.

only one way to get rid of disease.
Medicine Stick.name: Medicine Stick

Hazerd to his foes.

mmlore: A lush tranquility spreads
through the earth.
Roots' Repose.name: Roots' Repose

mmlore: A simple weapon, from an age long forgotten.
Can be restored to its former glory.

mmlore: "I found another corpse when I took
shelter in a ruined building to tend to
my wounds. It clutched this sickle in
its decayed hands. When I touched it,
the corpse collapsed into a black mist.
A chime rang out around me, and I
was forced to flee..."
Thresher's Sickle.name: Thresher's Sickle

mmlore: <dark_gray>As the air thins, the dance begins. Jerky,
<dark_gray>twisting gasps. Convulsions. Each twitch is
<dark_gray>another step in a fatal dance.
Vermin's Waltz-3.name: Vermin's Waltz

mmlore: <dark_gray>As the air thins, the dance begins. Jerky,

scent of nectar.

in your hands. For what is an item without
lore text?"

<dark_gray>heart of Kaul's former resting place,
<dark_gray>imbuing it with a rumbling rage.

Jaguar Tooth mountains, this dagger is
to pierce the heart of any Elder who falls
to the whisper of Gods.

mmlore: Within rebirth, that seed of temptation
bloomed. Hedera would turn towards the
sea, enchanted by a new voice...
Dryadic Temptation.name: Dryadic Temptation

mmlore: Fashioned from the remnants of a cutting
of the fabled Tree of Life. Its power still
pulses through the gnarled blade.
Edge of Tiferet.name: Edge of Tiferet

wispleaf tree, the blade yearns
for the magic of Celsia.

mmlore: No sir, it is evidently
a gigantic narwhal.
Fish Fin.name: Fish Fin

mmlore: The dagger is lightweight, and easy
to wield. Engraved on the blade,

mmlore: <dark_gray>There are few sights more beloved than the
<dark_gray>rising of the cooling moon during a voyage across
<dark_gray>dunes of Ishnir. Within the cities, it is the setting
<dark_gray>of the moon that brings joy and heralds Mauta's rise.
Ishnir's Moon.name: Ishnir's Moon

mmlore: In the end, all will bow to his
might and become one.
Jungle's Requiem.name: Jungle's Requiem

mmlore: With Hycenea sealed inside Blue alongside Harrakfar,
her grasp over the Wolfswood disappeared entirely.
It did not concern her, however. Her reunion with
Harrakfar was all that she needed.

mmlore: The symbol of a captain's hope.
What will you do with it?

mmlore: Carelessly left by one of the rebels

mmlore: He spoke the truth to the Void.
Beyond here there is nothingness,
yet the nothingness hungers still.

mmlore: Pelias' folly opened the minds of two peoples.
The Dichen to their destiny in the outer colonies,
and the Aradia to the plight of their lost god.
It was only natural that the two would ally.
Symbiosis-1.name: Symbiosis

As the elements struck them, they were
transformed, and Cazol's grasp on
their loyalty faded. They knew only
Kaul's voice now.

mmlore: Attuned to the power of the Elements.
Allows you to manipulate the elemental
connections within yourself, swapping
class loadouts at will.

<gray>to save and load class selection.
<gray><key:key.attack/> + <key:key.sneak/> while
<gray>in mainhand to erase stored class.
Cooldown : <#4ac2e5>5m when used in Survival zones
